attractions.about: War Remnants Museum is a unit under the Department of Culture, Sports and Tourism Ho Chi Minh City. Located in the museum system of Vietnam, the museum for world peace and a member of the World Council of Museums (ICOM), the War Remnants Museum, the Museum of thematic research, collection , storage, preservation and display of the material, photographs, artifacts on the evidence of the crime and the consequences of the war that the invasion force has caused to Vietnam.Museum store more than 20,000 documents, exhibits and films, in which more than 1,500 documents, artifacts, films have been applied to introduce in eight thematic exhibition frequently. In 35 years, the Museum has welcomed over 15 million visitors at home and abroad. Currently with about 500,000 visitors each year, the War Remnants Museum is one of the only cultural tourism to attract high public credibility at home and abroad.
attractions.address: 28 Vo Van Tan Ward 6, District 3, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
attractions.name: War Remnants Museum

attractions.about: Bitexco Financial Tower at a height of 262 meters is the tallest building in Ho Chi Minh City up to date. With design concept is taken from the shape of a lotus bud, the Vietnam national flower, Bitexco Financial Tower is not merely a building which is covered in glass and steel, but also a symbol of beauty and the rapid development of Ho Chi Minh City economy, a key economic region in Vietnam. Bitexco Financial Tower is a typical example for creativity and unique design. One of the tower highlights is the first observation in the city at 49th floors. Saigon Skydeck has opened for all visitors from January 1, 2011. With a full range of services and facilities for visitors, the Skydeck has officially opened to welcome visitors both domestic and international visitors since July, 2011. Visitors have the opportunity to visit Saigon Skydeck, not only enjoy the full sight of the Ho Chi Minh City and Saigon River, but also have the chance to use the facilities and services at this Skydeck. With many activities will be held at the Skydeck during this year, with special offer prices for different customer groups, the Skydeck will be an attractive destination in the journey of Ho Chi Minh City's for both domestic and international tourists.
attractions.name: Bitexco Financial Tower

attractions.about: À Ố Show is one of Vietnamese Bamboo Circus performances. À Ố - derives from Làng Phố, which means ‘village and city’. À Ố Show tells a captivating story of the transition from the peaceful life of the countryside to the fast-paced metropolitan life of modern Southern Vietnam. The soul of village life and, in stark contrast, familiar scenes from the city, are beautifully brought to life -- with bamboo! The stunning simplicity of the bamboo props frames an awe-inspiring circus featuring acrobatics, contortion, juggling, and stunting. Throughout the show, both traditional and modern music harmonize richly, performed live with 17 musical instruments. À Ố Show has become a world-renowned circus, critically acclaimed in 11 countries.
attractions.name: A O Show - Lune Production

attractions.about: Generations ago, Vietnamese puppeteers performed for their rural communities in waist-deep water, bringing to life legends and stories about their region. Water puppetry theaters like Golden Dragon Water Puppet Theater continue that tradition into the modern day and are a fun, family-friendly way to experience a hallmark of traditional Vietnamese culture.water puppet show, which is closely associated with the spiritual life of Vietnamese people, especially in the countryside. The show’s chosen stage is the surface of a water pool. The puppeteers present their clever skills in managing puppets by long bamboo rods and string mechanism under the surface. A traditional Vietnamese orchestra is an excellent music accompaniment. The puppets depict the story from the songs during the show, which reflects the peaceful life of the Vietnamese countryside, so it is not too difficult to understand it.
attractions.name: Golden Dragon Water Puppet Theater

attractions.about: Built in 1898 following the “flamboyant” style of the French 3rd Republic, Saigon Opera House was certified a National Relic & one of the top Ho Chi Minh City attractions. The Opera House hosts cultural entertaining performances, bamboo cirque, contemporary dance, orchestra concerts and government events. Come to the front gate to check availability and ticket to a performance in this iconic building.
attractions.address: 07 Lam Son Square Street District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
attractions.name: Saigon Opera House (Ho Chi Minh Municipal Theater)

attractions.about: “From Norodom Palace to Independence Palace 1868-1966” explores the century-long history of the building that once served as the seat of the French colonial government in Cochinchina. In 1954, this building was renamed Independence Palace. It subsequently witnessed many dramatic episodes in the rise and decline of the government of Ngo Dinh Diem, the founding leader of the Republic of Vietnam
attractions.name: The Independence Palace

stays.name: LOTTE HOTEL SAIGON
stays.address: 2A - 4A Ton Duc Thang St, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 70000 Vietnam
stays.about: Fronting the scenic Saigon River and only 3-5 minute walk to famous Opera House, Dong Khoi Street and Le Thanh Ton Street for shopping, dining and entertainment, LOTTE HOTEL SAIGON, the most beloved 5-star hotel in Ho Chi Minh City, combines natural beauty and sheer opulence to provide the best for the discerning traveler. The breathtaking resort-setting and its distinctive architectural interior gives a feeling of luxury and tranquility. A legendary hotel inherits good and ancient Vietnam with garden falls, pond and fountain. The top pattern of the bronze drum, symbol of the sun, from ancient times, frames the entrance of guest rooms. The twelve horary signs in the atrium, the lobby surrounded by colonnades and the giant horse sculptures all of which induce you to meander in the space of the hotel.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Park Hyatt Saigon
stays.address: 2 Lam Son Square District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 70000 Vietnam
stays.about: Park Hyatt Saigon enjoys a prime location on the city’s most famous square, overlooking Saigon Opera House, and within walking distance of the most popular cultural and historical attractions. The elegant, French colonial-style hotel houses 245 guestrooms and suites, redefining urban luxury with its sophisticated design, handcrafted details and modern-day comforts. World-class bars and restaurants include Opera, offering authentic Italian cuisine; Square One, serving both Vietnamese and Western dishes; Park Lounge, specialising in afternoon tea; and 2 Lam Son, one of the city’s top nightlife destinations. Residential-style meeting venues at Park Hyatt Saigon—the first of their kind, in the city—include the Pool House with a private barbecue area; and the Guest House featuring a show kitchen. For the ultimate in relaxation and rejuvenation, tranquil Xuan Spa offers wellness treatments inspired by traditional Vietnamese beauty rituals and ingredients, as well as a well-equipped fitness centre and elegant outdoor pool. The dedicated team at Park Hyatt Saigon provide warm, discreet and dignified service to those seeking relaxed, personalised luxury.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: The Reverie Saigon
stays.address: 22-36 Nguyen Hue Boulevard & 57-69F Dong Khoi Street District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
stays.about: The Reverie Saigon is a luxury hotel in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. Renowned for its beautiful interior designs, The Reverie Saigon also raises the bar for services and accommodations in Vietnam. Crafted to perfection, indulge in one of the 12 types of magnificently furnished accommodation as offered throughout 62 suites and 224 rooms. The highest hotel in Ho Chi Minh City, rooms and suites start from the 27th floor with beautiful panoramic views overlooking the central business district and the winding Saigon River through floor-to-ceiling windows. Interiors are curated by some of Italy’s most recognised furnishings design brands – including, amongst others, Colombostile, Giorgetti, Poltrona Frau Group and Visionnaire – with styles ranging from chic modern to classical European, from whimsically romantic to fanciful and sophisticated.

stays.about: Join us to experience the essence of Saigon city life at Liberty Central Saigon CityPoint as the perfect base to explore, meet and enjoy nightlife as well as business in Ho Chi Minh City. Only 8km from Tan Son Nhat International Airport, our hotel is located mere steps from Le Loi Boulevard, and within walking distance of the central business district, nightlife and the main points of interest.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Silverland Yen Hotel
stays.address: 73 - 75 Thu Khoa Huan St Ward Ben Thanh, District 01, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
stays.about: Silverland Yen Hotel is located on Thu Khoa Huan St. and Huyen Tran Cong Chua St. which were built by French architectures when forming Sai Gon. In Vietnamese, Yen is as a silent note on peaceful streets with over 100 years old tamarind trees, is a witness how urban changes. Surprisingly, Yen is only few steps away from Ben Thanh Market, Tao Dan Park, Independence Palace, Central Post Office and other historical, busiest places in Saigon, right in the strategic spot for both business and leisure travelers. Entering the lobby, a wide-open space, tranquility and filled with wood and stone where people can enjoy morning buffet or tea-break to find peace within your soul. Together with 63 rooms and suites which were offered free wifi internet access, you can participate a journey to explore a secret on rooftop, where you can experience Sauna, Steam Bath or relax in Jacuzzi with a cocktail. The cozy natural design boutique hotel brings you to the second home when you are far away from home

stays.about: Combining the classical charm of French Indochina with a sense of timeless chic that only MGallery can provide, Hôtel des Arts Saigon is perfect for people who travel with style and seek a hotel that included local character. Passionately independent, this exquisite Boutique Hotel fuses distinctive local flavor with classical charm and contemporary facilities to create unique and memorable stays. Only 5 minutes walking from major tourist spots and business areas. Hôtel des Arts Saigon, MGallery Collection is great choice either for business or leisure. Mr. Jean-Pierre Joncas, the General Manager and the entire team would like to welcome you.

stays.about: Silverland Sakyo Hotel & Spa stands proud to be a perfect fusion between Saigon and Tokyo. Inspired by the philosophy of simplicity, staying at Silverland Sakyo Hotel & Spa promises guests a deep contemplation in the soul thanks to the serene atmosphere. The facilities and services provided by Silverland Sakyo Hotel & Spa ensure a pleasant stay for guests. Located on Le Thanh Ton street, renown as "Little Tokyo" in the vibrant Saigon, Silverland Sakyo Hotel & Spa is close to the city's must-see markets, nightlife and shopping. Tan Son Nhat International Airport is only 6.4 km away. Silverland Sakyo Hotel & Spa is a must stay hotel for both holiday makers or discerning business travelers.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Le Meridien Saigon
stays.address: 3C Ton Duc Thang Street, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
stays.about: Situated in the heart of Ho Chi Minh City alongside the Saigon River, Le Méridien Saigon is your entry point to the many attractions of this storied city. Our 343 guest rooms and 26 suites support relaxed discovery, starting with city or river views. Modern comforts include LED TVs and High Speed Internet Access, our signature LM BED, and spacious marble bathrooms with rainforest shower and separate French-style bathtub. Discover intriguing opportunities to relax and indulge, from signature treatments at Explore Spa, to our infinity-edge indoor pool, to our state-of-the-art fitness centre. Our restaurants and bars offer distinct culinary experiences with international arrays of food and drink.

stays.about: Discover the stories of Saigon's captivating past at Silverland Charner, a stylish hideaway nestled in the city's historic heart. Inspired by the teahouses of the French colonial era, Silverland Charner is a charming blend of old and new Saigon, where every space brings the spirit of Indochine to life.

stays.address: 19-23 Lam Son Square, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
stays.about: Caravelle Saigon is one of Ho Chi Minh City's leading international 5-star hotels - in the centre of the business, shopping and entertainment district, 8 km from Tan Son Nhat International Airport. The Hotel opened in 1959 with modern design combining French and Vietnamese architecture and to this day the address and service ensures we have kept our iconic landmark status in the Heart of Saigon.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Hotel Continental Saigon
stays.address: 132-134 Dong Khoi Street, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 70000 Vietnam
stays.about: Welcome to Hotel Continental Saigon, your Ho Chi Minh City “home away from home.” Hotel Continental Saigon aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Ho Chi Minh City, Continental Hotel is located a short distance from Nguyen Hue Street (0.2 mi) and The World of Heineken (0.4 mi).Guest rooms offer a flat screen TV, a minibar, and air conditioning, and Continental Hotel makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including a concierge and room service. In addition, guests can enjoy a fitness center and free breakfast during their visit.While visiting Ho Chi Minh City, you may want to try some tapas at one of the nearby restaurants, such as Cuc Gach Quan, Bun Cha 145 Bui Vien, or Shri Restaurant & Lounge.Ho Chi Minh City is also known for some great government buildings, including Central Post Office, The Independence Palace, and Saigon Opera House (Ho Chi Minh Municipal Theater), which are not too far from Hotel Continental Saigon.Hotel Continental Saigon puts the best of Ho Chi Minh City at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.address: 197/2 Nguyen Van Huong Street, District 2, Ho Chi Minh City 70000 Vietnam
stays.about: Villa Song Saigon is a lovely boutique hotel with 23 luxuriously appointed rooms and suites, located in District 2, along the banks of the Saigon River. Recently underwent a major renovation and total refurbishment exercise in December 2013. Suitable for romantic getaways as well as corporate board meetings. Rejuvenate in our in house Spa. Eclectic food and beverage options with all day dining at Bistro Song Vie, classic cocktails at our bar and a very good wine cellar; all coupled with a stunning view of the Saigon River. River transfers available from our private pier at the Villa itself, direct to the heart of District 1.

We have various room types to accommodate different guest needs including standard double/twin rooms as well as large family rooms that can accommodate group of 4-5 guests.

stays.name: Erato Boutique Hotel
stays.address: 44-46 Hong Ha Str Tan Binh District, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
stays.about: Looking for a place to stay in Ho Chi Minh City? Then look no further than Erato Boutique Hotel, a budget friendly hotel that brings the best of Ho Chi Minh City to your doorstep.Guest rooms offer a flat screen TV, a minibar, and air conditioning, and Erato Boutique Hotel makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including a 24 hour front desk, 24 hour check-in, and baggage storage. As an added convenience, there is parking available to guests.Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Chua Vinh Nghiem (1.8 mi) and Tan Dinh Church (2.3 mi), guests of Erato Boutique Hotel can easily experience some of Ho Chi Minh City's most well known attractions.Travelers looking for Mediterranean restaurants can head to Jardin Des Sens Restaurant, The Bawa's Grill, or Cai Thung Go Ltd. Co.If you’re looking for something to do, The Independence Palace, People's Committee Building, and Cholon Mosque are a nice way to spend some time.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Erato Boutique Hotel as you experience everything Ho Chi Minh City has to offer.

stays.name: Hon En Hotel & Spa
stays.address: 138B Le Loi, P4 Go Vap District, Ho Chi Minh City Vietnam
stays.about: See why so many travelers make Hon En Hotel & Spa their hotel of choice when visiting Ho Chi Minh City. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a budget friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Ho Chi Minh City, Hon En Hotel & Spa is located a short distance from Chua Vinh Nghiem (1.8 mi) and Emperor Jade Pagoda (2.0 mi).Hon En Hotel & Spa is a budget friendly hotel offering a refrigerator, air conditioning, and a minibar in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.The hotel features a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service. Plus, guests can enjoy a sauna and an on-site restaurant, which have made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Ho Chi Minh City. For guests with a vehicle, parking is available.While visiting Ho Chi Minh City, you may want to try some schnitzel at one of the nearby restaurants, such as Hoa Vien Brauhaus, Brotzeit, or Brotzeit German Bier Bar & Restaurant.If you are interested in exploring Ho Chi Minh City, check out one of the government buildings, such as Central Post Office, The Independence Palace, and Saigon Opera House (Ho Chi Minh Municipal Theater).At Hon En Hotel & Spa, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Ho Chi Minh City.

stays.about: Greeted by a unique Vietnamese smile and served with a welcome drink, you will feel like you have arrived at your second home. Hotel L' Odeon is a boutique hotel decorated by a French designer with a Franco-British style and well-equipped with all the necessary amenities enabling our guests to feel at home. Awarded the Certificate of Excellence 2017 by TripAdvisor (the world's largest travel site) our mission is to provide our valued guests with the most hospitable and memorable stay. Whether you're visiting Ho Chi Minh City for business or leisure, we offer you a truly comfortable stay.

stays.name: Hotel Grand Saigon
stays.address: 08 Dong Khoi Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
stays.about: One Of The Oldest Hotels In Ho Chi Minh City Since 1930 and completely restored in 1997, nestled in Saigon's scenic riverside area and within walking distance to major commercial and entertainment addresses, and still retains its French colonial style, provides a perfect base for conducting business or for having a completely relaxed vacation. At the Grand, every guest will enjoy a well-appointed room or a luxurious suite with plenty of room to live, to work or just to relax. Our warm inviting atmosphere, congenial staff and host of fine services help to make every stay the most enjoyable one. Our philosophy is to satisfy our guest in every possible way from the first time. You only have to bring yourself and time to relax and we will make sure that your holidays and business trip will be comfortable.

stays.name: Duc Vuong Hotel
stays.address: 195 Bui Vien St, Pham Ngu Lao ward, Dist 1, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
stays.about: Duc Vuong Hotel Situated on Bui Vien Street, Dist 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Viet Nam. Duc Vuong Hotel is one of the busiest tourists place where thousands of people from all over the world visit each year. Duc Vuong Hotel has easy access to many tourists attraction around the City. Duc Vuong Hotel was established in 2006 with 20 rooms, and thanks to our wonderful guests and excellent attentive staff, we have now proudly expanded our family friendly Hotel to 51 beautiful rooms. We also have added an additional location in District 10.Duc Vuong Hotel's goal is to ensure our guests always have a memorable and enjoyable travel experience. Our friendly and caring staff is here to serve you and we are more then happy to assist and arrange additional requests for special occasions such as birthdays, anniversaries, celebrations and also any other group meetings or parties. We are family! Duc Vuong's unique, charming and peaceful Garden Terrace restaurant & Lounge, offers a serene place to relax in comfort, after a long day of site seeing and enjoying your experience in our exciting and busy city. Duc Vuong's Garden Terrace restaurant & lounge is a quiet place for you to enjoy a relaxing and delicious, fresh and memorable meal, hors d'oeuvres and delectable unique drinks, all prepared with care by our phenomenal bartender and chef. This is also a brilliant place to view the sunrise, sunset and of course the very radiant moonlight! You will be amazed at the stunning view from high above the busy streets while experiencing the city lights and radiant moonlight The spacious, inviting visitors lounge always has fresh flowers, fruit and hot tea for you and your guests to enjoy.

stays.name: Victory Airport Hotel
stays.address: 96 Yen The Ward 2, Tan Binh, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
stays.about: Victory Airport Hotel is situated in the Tan Binh district of Ho Chi Minh City. This 3-star hotel features free high Speedtest WIFI, free parking and a 24-hour front desk. Tan Son Nhat International Airport, 0.8 km from the property. Ben Thanh Market is 6 km from Victory Airport Hotel; War museum is 5 km Giac Lam Pagoda is 6 km away and China Town is 7km away, Giac Vien is 7km. It locates in prime business location and is very walkable to the airport, public transportation, restaurants, cafes and convenient stores. Yet the hotel is on aside street, so it is very quiet and safe. The room are spacious, moderately equipped with LED TV (vietnames and English channels), AC, mini bar, hair dryers, tempurpedic mattress, down alternative pillows, blankets and 500ct 100% cotton linen.

stays.name: C Central Hotel
stays.address: 216 De Tham Pham Ngu Lao, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
stays.about: C CENTRAL HOTEL is right in the lively Bui Vien - De Tham neighborhood - in the heart of district 1 in Ho Chi Minh City, within easy reach of rooftop bars, hip restaurants, historical and cultural attractions,.. This is the ideal place to be, as visitors have easy access to all the main company headquarters, while the best city nightlife is right on the doorstep. Whether you’re after a sophisticated drink within one of Saigon’s hidden whiskey bars, or you’re up for some people-watching in the city’s glitzy nightclubs, there’s no better place to be. C CENTRAL HOTEL is the best place for you if you love nightlife and ready to enjoy the funky atmosphere with many bars, pubs on the streets and the music all night long.

attractions.about: Art in Paradise Danang is the first 3D Trick Art Museum in Danang and the largest one in Viet Nam. Come to the museum, you will be suprised by hundreds of 3D art works. They were all drawn and painted by hand that used three-dimensional and scientific method combinations to make the paintings look realistic and live, and you can be part of them. It's not just an art, but a paradise. You will have a lot of happy memories with your family and friends here. Love!
attractions.name: 3D Museum Art in Paradise Danang

attractions.about:
The Da Nang Museum of Cham Sculpture is one of the first museums built in Vietnam by the French. The main building was constructed in 1915. It evokes some motifs of French colonial architecture in the early twentieth century and resembles the image of the Champa temples - towers in Central Viet Nam. 

Visitors will have the opportunity to contemplate more than 400 artifacts on display, including National Treasures and others representing the masterpieces of Champa sculpture in ten centuries (from 5th to 15th). The artifacts were made in a variety of materials, such as sandstone, terracotta, and metal. Grounded in various themes from fertility symbols, deities, mythical animals and architectural decoration from the Hindu and Buddhist, they express the features of cultural and religious values of the Champa people over many generations. 

The Da Nang Museum of Cham Sculpture is a must-see destination for visitors wishing to discover the culture and heritage of Central Viet Nam.
attractions.address: No 2, 2 Thang 9 Street Hái Châu District, Da Nang 550000 Vietnam
attractions.name: Da Nang Museum of Cham Sculpture

attractions.about: Da Nang Fine Arts Museum was founded on July 29, 2014 as a representative of the Central Region and Highlands to preserve, introduce and promote the values of the artistic heritage in the area. Located in the center of Da Nang City, at 78 Le Duan Street, Thach Thang Ward, Hai Chau District, Da Nang Fine Arts Museum is currently preserving and displaying a collection of about 1000 works of modern arts and traditional handicrafts in a three-floor exhibition with a total area of 1,185.5 m2. On the first floor, there is a reception, a theme exhibition area and an arts learning space for children. On the second floor, you can see a permanent exhibition that showcases modern art works which cover a wide range of materials, media such as oil, lacquer, silk, graphics and sculptures and so forth. On the third floor, it features a display of traditional folk arts and handicraft artifacts of Da Nang and the Central Region and Highlands as well.

Referring to Vietnam, we do not forget to mention Pho - a typical dish that many tourists eat and leave a lasting impression on their mind. Our hotel understands that demand and chooses Pho to make night food for customers staying here. Among hundreds of hotels in Da Nang, Monarque Hotel is proud to rank “the number one” on Tripadvisor's website, bringing in its upmarket beauty and profession with enthusiastic staff, we are confident to bring our beloved customers the best experience and unforgettable impression.

attractions.about: Hanoi’s lively Old Quarter comprises nearly 40 streets packed with shops selling all kinds of goods, each street named for its primary good or service.
attractions.name: Old Quarter

attractions.about: All you need to step foot in the door.
attractions.address: Quoc Tu Giam Street Dong Da District, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
attractions.name: Temple of Literature & National University

attractions.about: Vietnam Museum of Ethnology is a unit under Vietnam Academy of Scocial Sciences. Vietnam Museum of Ethnology is both a research centre and a public museum exhibiting the ethnic groups of Vietnam. The mission of the Museum is scientific research, collection, documentation, conservation, exhibition and preserving the cultural and historic patrimony of the nation's different ethnic groups. The museum also serves to guide research, conservation, and technology that are specific to the work of an ethnographic museum.
attractions.name: Vietnam Museum of Ethnology

attractions.about: Focused on the contribution of women to Vietnam's history and culture, this museum highlights their roles in Vietnam's many military conflicts as well as in commerce, including features on female street vendors, women's role in the family, and more recently, single mothers in Vietnam.
attractions.name: Vietnamese Women's Museum

attractions.about: Colloquially known as "Hanoi Hilton," this famous prison has been mostly torn down. A museum occupies the remaining structure.
attractions.name: Hoa Lo Prison

attractions.about: A rare breed of turtle enjoys this popular lake almost as much as countless locals and tourists. Hoan Kiem Lake is a dynamic daily tableau, from morning walks amid locals doing exercises on the shore, to young couples water-gazing on park benches, to the multiple shopping and sight-seeing opportunities in the vicinity.  Centrally located in the city, Hoan Kiem Lake serves as a massive home base, and provides endless people-watching and recreational opportunities on the edge of the Old Quarter.
attractions.name: Lake of the Restored Sword (Hoan Kiem Lake)

attractions.about: The Long Bien bridge across the Red River connects Hanoi with the main port of Haiphong. Designed by Gustave Eiffel, the bridge sustained significant damage during the Vietnam War. Only half of the bridge retains its original shape, but a rebuilding project supported by the French government is currently in progress to restore the bridge to its original appearance.
attractions.name: Long Bien Bridge

attractions.about: Resembling the Opéra Palais Garnier, Hanoi Opera House, built in 10 years since 1911 by two French architects. The magnificent building became one of the top landmarks in Hanoi. The Opera House hosts cultural entertaining performances, bamboo cirque, contemporary dance, orchestra concerts and government events. Come to the front gate to check availability and ticket to a performance in this iconic building.
attractions.address: 01 Tràng Tiên - Phan Chu Trinh Old Quarter, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
attractions.name: Hanoi Opera House

attractions.about: The Lotte Observation Deck is on the 65F, 267m high from the ground with large space.We have the Photo Zone in B1F, the Photo Counter and the Photo at Skywalk in the 65F so you can taking and buying photo, including photo frame. The Media Gallery is exciting, including Inner U&I machine to test the romantic degree for couple. We also have the Lotteria and Angel In Us Coffee
attractions.name: Lotte Observation Deck

attractions.about: Entering this majestic church is like walking into 1886, as little has changed since it first opened its doors.
attractions.address: 40 Nha Chung Hang Trong, Hoan Kiem, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
attractions.name: St. Joseph's Cathedral

attractions.about: This museum was opened in 1966. Though in need of updating, some interesting artifacts are on display in its three floors organized chronologically.
attractions.address: 66 Nguyen Thai Hoc St, Hanoi 10000 Vietnam
attractions.name: Fine Arts Museum (Bao Tang My Thuat)

attractions.about: **This place is temporarily closed** Every year many thousands of respectful citizens and tourists visit the final resting place of the country’s most notable historic figure.
attractions.name: Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum

attractions.about: Chùa Trấn Quốc (or Tran Quoc Pagoda) is located beside the dazzling West Lake, on Thanh Nien Road, Hanoi. Particularly, it is seated on an island linked by a bridge to the causeway between the two most romantic lakes of Hanoi: West Lake and Truc Bach Lake.
attractions.name: Chua Tran Quoc

attractions.about: Wellcome to Ho Chi Minh Museum! President Ho Chi Minh - Vietnamese hero of national liberation and great man of culture. After he passed away on September 2nd 1969, in compliance with the Vietnamese people’s aspiration, the Communist Party of Vietnam’s Politburo decided to build the Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum and the Ho Chi Minh Museum. After 20 years of preparing and building, the Ho Chi Minh Museum was inaugurated on September 2nd 1990, on the occasion of the 100th birthday of the President. Ho Chi Minh Museum has more than 170,000 decuments, objects and films about President Ho Chi Minh’s life and revolutionary work. They are invaluable assets of the Vietnamese people in educating patriotism, studying and following Ho Chi Minh’s thought and moral quallties; and encouraging the Vietnamese generations to succeed failthfully and excellently his great revolutionary work.
attractions.name: Ho Chi Minh Museum

attractions.about: This repository of Vietnam's military history includes rooms full of war propganda, photographs and documents from wars against China, France, and the United States. The grounds feature several captured aircraft as well as a central structure build from the wreckage of French and American planes. Visitors may climb the flag tower, with great views from the top.
attractions.name: Vietnam Military History Museum

attractions.about: Welcome to the Imperial Citadel of Thang Long – Hanoi! Situated at the heart of Hanoi, the Central Sector of the Imperial Citadel of Thang Long is an outstanding place of interest not only for the capital city but also for the country as a whole. The site is one of the ten special national heritage sites proclaimed by the Prime Minister in 2009 and was inscribed on the World Heritage List by UNESCO’s World Heritage Committee in 2010. Its Outstanding Universal Values are reflected in its historical longevity, its continuous role as a seat of power, and its multiple cultural layers. The World Heritage Site comprises two sections: the archaeological site at 18 Hoang Dieu Street and the central axis of the Nguyen Dynasty’s Citadel of Hanoi, which together create an integrated heritage complex. This was the most important sector of Thang Long Citadel, the capital of Dai Viet under the Ly, Tran, and Le dynasties from the 11th to the 18th centuries. It was also the core of the earlier Dai
attractions.name: Imperial Citadel of Thang Long

attractions.about: Duong Lam is a commune of Son Tay town, Hanoi, Vietnam. Duong Lam becomes the first ancient village in Vietnam. Two of Vietnam’s kings, Phung Hung (761-802) and Ngo Quyen (896-944) were born in Duong Lam, giving the village its prestige. Both men led resistance wars against northern invasion and after winning national independence, were crowned kings. After their deaths, the local people built tem

stays.name: Fortuna Hotel Hanoi
stays.address: 6B Lang Ha Street Ba Dinh District, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
stays.about: Cultivating the latest trend of Asian hospitality, the hotel is designed to the height of modern luxury with meticulous attention to details and dedicated service for discerning business and leisure travelers. Perfectly located in the financial and commercial district of Hanoi, within close proximity to the Old Quarter and minutes driving to National Convention Center, Fortuna Hotel is the ideal venue for business, leisure, meetings or events. Be it 350 well-appointed guest rooms, exclusive Executive Club floors, exquisite restaurants and dining experience, fully equipped state of the art fitness & spa facilities or 2 Grand Ballrooms & 6 multi-functional meeting room, it is a perfect venue for business or leisure stay.

stays.name: Hanoi La Siesta Hotel Trendy
stays.address: 12 Nguyen Quang Bich Street, Hoan Kiem District Old Quarter, Hanoi 10000 Vietnam
stays.about: Finding an ideal charming hotel in Hanoi does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Hanoi La Siesta Hotel Trendy, a nice option for travelers like you.Rooms at Hanoi La Siesta Hotel Trendy provide a flat screen TV, a refrigerator, and a minibar, and guests can stay connected with free wifi.In addition, while staying at Hanoi La Siesta Hotel Trendy guests have access to a concierge and room service. You can also enjoy free breakfast.Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as St. Joseph's Cathedral (0.3 mi) and Imperial Citadel of Thang Long (0.4 mi), guests of Hanoi La Siesta Hotel Trendy can easily experience some of Hanoi's most well known attractions.If you’re looking for a seafood restaurant, consider a visit to Cha Ca Thang Long, Avalon BBQ Garden, or Old Quarter Street Food Cafe & Cooking Class, which are all conveniently located a short distance from Hanoi La Siesta Hotel Trendy.Hanoi is also known for some great gardens, including Ly Thai To Park and Botanical Gardens (Vuon Bach Thao), which are not too far from Hanoi La Siesta Hotel Trendy.Hanoi La Siesta Hotel Trendy puts the best of Hanoi at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

stays.name: La Siesta Premium Hang Be
stays.address: 27 Hang Be Hoan Kiem, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
stays.about: Welcome to luxury boutique La Siesta Premium hotel located right in the centre of Hanoi Old Quarter. The hotel is surrounded by the most famous landscapes and historical spots of Ha Noi, just 2-minute walk to Hoan Kiem Lake (the Sword Lake). GREAT FACILITIES, GREAT SERVICE & GREAT LOCATION: Set in the heart of the ‘Eternal Soul of Hanoi’, the Old Quarter. Just 2-minute walk away from historical iconic landmarks, including the Hoan Kiem Lake, Ngoc Son Temple, Statue of King Ly, Opera. GREAT FACILITIES: Recently and very impressively renovated, we provide an excellent number of services; 60 hotel rooms, well-known La Spa, fine dining Cloud Nine restaurant, top-notch Lighthouse Sky Bar & free internet access throughout. Most rooms have large windows that can be opened to the fresh air and that also provide ample natural light. Dine with delight in our glass walled restaurant, enjoy the drink on the top floor Sky bar, and take in the panoramic view of all the Old Quarter has to offer!

stays.name: AIRA Boutique Hanoi Hotel & Spa
stays.address: 38A Tran Phu Street, Hanoi 10000 Vietnam
stays.about: Nestled in the lush tree-lined boulevard at No. 38A of the charming diplomatic Tran Phu Street, merely few steps from the quaint Hanoi Old Quarter and adjacent to many iconic monuments. The luxury 4+ star AIRA Boutique Hanoi Hotel & Spa is perfectly suited either your upscale business stay, a pampered vacation or a romantic getaway. With 60 luxurious, elegantly appointed rooms, Aira Boutique Hanoi offer a full array of high end services such as 360 degree panoramic view sky bar, award-winning restaurant, bakery & coffee shop, full spa parlor, boutique shop, a gym and all-season infinity pool. The famous Essence restaurant opens full day serving authentic Vietnamese and Japanese cuisine to satisfy your taste buds. Besides, shopping lovers can spend their time at Duccio and Heydi tailoring shops and later indulge in the favourite Essencia Spa, which is designed for rejuvenation and total relaxation. Step off the bustling streets of Hanoi and enter a serene retreat, prepare to be pampered at most.

stays.name: Hanoi La Siesta Hotel & Spa
stays.address: 94 Ma May St., Old Quarter Hoan Kiem Dist., Hanoi 10000 Vietnam
stays.about: ABOUT US HANOI LA SIESTA HOTEL & SPAA peaceful hotel with a homely feel, The La Siesta hotel is the newest member of the Hanoi Elegance hotel Group.  Set apart from the rest of our other properties, it embodies pure luxury. Promising a warm welcome and personal service superbly located on old Ma May Street, it is in easy reach of Hanoi's evocative Hoan Kiem lake and major attractions. The latest gem is both modern in style as well as embodying the hidden charm of Hanoi's old quarter.  The hotel has 50 spacious bedrooms, including Suites and Duplex rooms. The Suites have modern and comfortable facilities with seating area. And the duplex rooms are particularly good for families and groups of friends.  Other facilities include a spa, gym, movie room to help you relax even more during your stay with us.For food lovers experience Vietnam's authentic cuisine at the Redbean Restaurant on the ground floor.  Additional thoughtful touches include our 24hour customer service, evening turn-down service, free unlimited wireless internet with PC in every room, cable TV and movies on demand, DVD player...Etc, which we hope will make your stay extra  special. Come and enjoy traditional Vietnamese hospitality in style and comfort and experience our Hanoi Elegance outstanding customer service at La Siesta Hotel.Hanoi La Siesta Hotel & Spa

Timeless yet contemporary, classic yet cutting-edge, the elegant mixture of luxury and comfort makes JM Marvel become the most outstanding four star hotel that catches the eyes of any traveller. stays.name: Bonsella Hotel
stays.address: 03 Bao Khanh Str Hoan Kiem, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
stays.about: If you’re looking for a romantic hotel in Hanoi, look no further than Bonsella Hotel.For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Hanoi, Bonsella Hotel is located a short distance from St. Joseph's Cathedral (0.1 mi) and Hanoi Opera House (0.7 mi).Bonsella Hotel offers guests an array of room amenities including a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available.The hotel offers a 24 hour front desk, room service, and a concierge, to make your visit even more pleasant. The property also features free breakfast. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to street parking.While in Hanoi be sure to experience local schnitzel favorites at Jacksons Steakhouse, Black Jack's Restaurant, or Der Imbiss - German Street Food.Best of all, Bonsella Hotel makes it easy to experience many great Hanoi attractions like Vietnam Military History Museum, Hanoi Flag Tower, and Vietnamese Air Force Museum, which are some popular military museums.The staff at Bonsella Hotel looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

All 50 elegant rooms on 8th floors including connecting room type and 24 suites are with cozy duvet sleep system, seating area, desk, Internet TV system,... Built with the concept of a second home in Hanoi, The Silk Path Boutique Hanoi provides guests with those extra-special touches that help make a stay extraordinarily pleasant. Set among parks and lakes the hotel is a quiet retreat of serenity and comfort from the city’s vibrant streets. From the moment you are welcomed into the Hotel’s spacious Lobby, you will be surrounded by Vietnamese charm and traditional Japanese hospitality. The hotel features 256 generously sized and beautifully decorated guest rooms and suites with Hanoi City or Thong Nhat Park views.Whether your travel plans include meetings, conventions or leisure, the hotel can accommodate you in style and comfort - while offering a variety of amenities to make your stay a most rewarding one.

stays.address: 117 Tran Duy Hung Street, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
stays.about: See why so many travelers make Grand Plaza Hanoi Hotel their hotel of choice when visiting Hanoi. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a family-friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at Grand Plaza Hanoi Hotel offer a minibar and air conditioning.During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service. Guests of Grand Plaza Hanoi Hotel are also welcome to enjoy a pool and free breakfast, located on site. For travelers arriving by car, free parking is available.Nearby landmarks such as Sky 72 Observatory (1.0 mi) and Keangnam Hanoi Landmark Tower (1.9 mi) make Grand Plaza Hanoi Hotel a great place to stay when visiting Hanoi.While you’re here, be sure to check out some of the Italian restaurants, including 3 Spoons, Kone Cafe, and Paula’s Wines, all of which are a short distance from Grand Plaza Hanoi Hotel.There is no shortage of things to do in the area: explore popular history museums such as Vietnam Museum of Ethnology, Ho Chi Minh Museum, and Vietnam National Museum of History.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Grand Plaza Hanoi Hotel as you experience all of the things Hanoi has to offer.

stays.name: Grandiose Hotel & Spa
stays.address: 9-11 Lieu Giai St., Ba Dinh Dist., Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
stays.about: Grandiose Hotel and Spa is a brand new 4-star hotel centrally located in a convenient location. The hotel is easily accessible from the airport and is surrounded by both office buildings and modern stores for convenient shopping and a variety of restaurants. - With 68 well- equipped guestrooms and 2 services Apartments, Grandiose Hotel and Spa offer guests an extraordinary place that is created by combining unique architecture, expressive decor, and local features all in one great location. Staying at Grandiose Hotel and Spa, guest can enjoy a sport of luxury in a homely environment, with many convenient services on offer.

stays.name: Hanoi Antique Legend Hotel
stays.address: 23 Lo Su Street, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
stays.about: Located in the heart of Hanoi Old Quarter, Antique Legend Hotel is situated 150 m from Hoan Kiem Lake. Spacious rooms offer free internet access and views of the city, Red River or historic Lo Su Street. Antique Hotel is a 3-minute walk from Ngoc Son Temple and the Hanoi Opera House. Noi Bai International Airport is a 40-minute drive away. Modern rooms are decorated with classic dark wood furniture and flooring. Each has a flat-screen TV and tea and coffee-making facilities. Free bottled water and a safety deposit box are provided. Guests can make use of computers with internet access at the lobby. Secretarial services are available at the business centre. Luggage storage is offered at the 24-hour front desk. A breakfast buffet can be enjoyed in the hotel’s restaurant.

stays.name: PentStudio West Lake Hanoi
stays.address: 699 Lac Long Quan Plot B, Auction Zone D1, Phu Thuong Ward, Tay Ho District, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
stays.about: Located within a 21-storey integrated development, PentStudio West Lake Hanoi is a modern building, housing 151 units that come in various size. It is one-of-a-kind residential project designed with a mezzanine floor, providing thoughtfully integrated living space and an unobstructed view overlooking the Red River and West Lake.

With our amenities, we can answer as well FIT and GIT in the best conditions 3 Restaurants (Sen Viet Buffet Restaurant, Sen Viet Sky Bar Restaurant, Sen Restaurant, Kawachi Japanese Restaurant),Bar, Conference and Wedding rooms, swimming-pool, Spa and traditional massage, Jacuzzi, gym center, Night-Club and Karaoke, Business Center...

attractions.about: Located on the banks of the poetic Thu Bon River, in central Quang Nam province, 30 kilometers south of Da Nang, Hoi An ancient town is an Eastern oriental classic captivation. With the strategic location on the banks of the great river, with one seaside border (East), it used to be one of the major trading centers in Southeast Asia during the 16th century due to the early western trader occupying period.
attractions.name: Hoi An Ancient Town

attractions.about: Hoi An Night Market, occupying Nguyen Hoang Street in the centre of town, consists of over 50 local vendors selling a variety of local snacks, trinkets, clothing, jewellery, and accessories. Widely regarded as one of the most popular markets in Vietnam, it occupies a 300-metre-long street that overlooks Thu Bon River and is illuminated by hundreds of colourful lanterns, making a popular spot for photography as well.
attractions.address: Nguyen Hoang Street, Hoi An 560000 Vietnam
attractions.name: Hoi An Night Market

attractions.about: Known for A O Show, My Village, Teh Dar, and The Mist, spectacles that charm audience in Saigon, Hanoi, and 4 continents around the world, Lune Production now comes to Hoi An. Our own established venue, Hoi An Lune Center, begins welcoming local and international guests to amazing cultural expreriences from January 2018.
attractions.name: Hoi An Lune Center

attractions.about: Tra Que is a charming little village on the edge of Hoi An, the village is named after the sweet scented vegetables that spice up the everyday meals of the Pho Hoi people. Experience a day of living and working with the local people in Tra Que vegetable village, in which you will have a chance to discover the daily life of farmers.

attractions.about: Each of the many animal statues in this stunning meeting hall symbolize some life quality such as wisdom, longevity and nobility; Chinese merchants from the Phuc Kien province built this structure in 1697.

attractions.about: A local favorite, construction on this covered bridge began in the Year of the Monkey (1593) and was finished in the Year of the Dog (1595), hence the monkey and dog sculptures at either end.

attractions.about: Cham islands are 15km from Cua Dai. There are seven islands altogether named according to their shape or characteristics. They are called Lao ( pear ), Dai ( long ), La ( leaf), Kho ( dry ),Tai ( ear ),Mo ( tomb ) and Nom ( East Wind ). They have good climate, cool the year round, trees and animals as well as marine life are plentiful here. On the island, there are precious bird nests while under the water, the coral is marvelous. There are also scenic spots around the island, such as Suoi Tinh ( Love stream), Suoi Ong ( Sir’s stream ), Hon Chong ( Piled up rocks ),Hang Ba ( The lady’s cave ). the island is also surrounded by very nice beaches with clean white sand and transparent, cool water.
attractions.address: Cham Island Harbour, Hoi An 560000 Vietnam
attractions.name: Cham Island (Cu Lao Cham)

The intimate and relaxing atmosphere, the personalized and refined service and the thorough attention to detail make each stay at the La Residencia Hoian an unforgettable experience. Every room and suite, furnished in the classical style, reflects the characteristic comfort and charm of the hotel as a whole, and delivers a superior standard of service including access to the latest technology while offering views of the Ancient Town or Hoai River.

stays.address: 28 Nguyen Tat Thanh, Hoi An 560000 Vietnam
stays.about: Surrounded by tropical gardens, Mulberry Collection Silk Village offers a luxurious resort experience for guests to enjoy their stay in the UNESCO World Heritage town. At Mulberry Collection Silk Village we go above and beyond to ensure a truly memorable guest experience. Elements of traditional Vietnamese design combined with modern, luxury styling create an indulgent retreat in our new Trendy Wing which was opened in March 2019. The resort offers 131 modern and luxurious guestrooms, from the elegant, traditional Villa style accommodation to the contemporary and well appointed Duplex Suite. You will experience a true sense of Vietnam’s rich history and culture while being treated to 5 star luxury accommodation and an unparalleled range of guest services including a boutique and an in house tailor.

stays.about: Uniquely located right by the white-sand An Bang beach, nestled in lush tropical gardens, lulled by the song of the sea, one will find the ultimate relaxation in our luxury Aira Boutique Hoi An hotel & villa, owned and managed by Aira Hospitality Group (AHG). With 40 luxurious rooms, suites & villa allocated in 2 blocks, a Vietnamese restaurant, a day spa and 2 outdoor swimming pools, Aira Boutique Hoi An offers 4-star facilities served by a dedicated English spoken team. For beach lovers, we provide you with private sun beds, umbrellas and towels on the beach. Besides, there is an array of restaurants, bars and shops nearby to cater to all your need. Water sports are on the beach in front of the hotel and a golf course is 4km away. For those who want to explore the area, the UNESCO-heritage Hoi An ancient town is less than 5km (cycling over there along the rice paddy field is another great experience) and Da Nang international airport is only a 20-minute drive.

attractions.name: Diep Son Island

attractions.about: Situated 56km SE of Nha Trang, this newly developed site includes a reconstruction of Dr Alexandre Yersin's outstation. The building contains items of original furniture transported from the Dr Yersin Museum in Nha Trang, and reproductions of several period photographs. Entrance fee to the historical site is 30,000 dong. On site parking is free.Also on site are: an open sided canteen, and five small chalets for rent at 500,000 dong per night per couple (100,000 dong per additional guest). Electricity is available, but as yet is inexplicably not connected. Hence (1) the canteen menu is limited to dried fish, dried squid and fresh chicken, killed just for you. Tea, coffee, soft drinks and non-refigerated beer are available without ice; (2) the chalets are unheated and without hot water; and (3) small kerosene hurrican lamps are used for lighting.To get here, go 17km from Nha Trang towards Saigon, turn right at Suoi Cat commune at a blue and white tourist sign "Ho Chua Nuoc Suoi Dau", after one km and turn left a market onto the Hon Ba road. Follow this road 38km to Hon Ba peak.A visit to this site would suit history buffs and those just wishing an escape from summer heat in Nha Trang. Good swimming holes are available in the stream at the bottom of the mountain, especially near the Foresty Inspection Station boom gate, 13km from the Suoi Cat turn off.

stays.about: Nestled in the heart of Nha Trang Beach city, TTC Hotel Premium - Michelia is an ideal spot from which to discover Nha Trang. Located on a separate island in one of the world's 30 most beautiful bays, Vinpearl Nha Trang Resort features as a luxurious, idyllic, romantic and attractive resort . Not only being endowed by the nature with blue sea, white sand, bright sun and lush coconut trees but by the hands and sharp minds of talented people, who created an exquisite design, Vinpearl Nha Trang Resort has become the leading Hotel & Resort Complex in Vietnam. Vinpearl Nha Trang Resort enamors every visitor not only with the international "5 Star" hotel, longest sea-crossing cableway in the world, the best natural beach in Nha Trang or the most modern and largest outdoor swimming pool in South East Asia, but also premium wellness and beauty services and a wide selection of comfortable and luxurious restaurants. Come and let your soul leisurely float in a peaceful nature of Vinpearl Nha Trang, with all senses awakened for a full feel of perfection from every exceptional service and you will know why Nha Trang is indisputably given such luxurious and attractive names as "The tropical paradise", "Brilliant flower basket on the East Sea Coast" or "Vietnamese pearl".

attractions.about: Just as true love has to surpass several obstacles, the Valley of Love in Dalat had to surpass many challenges in the past in order to gain its rightful name today. In the beginning, the valley was called Vallée D’amour (Valley of Love) by the French before being renamed The Valley of Piece. In 1935, its beauty and captivation persuaded people to once again name it after the most wonderful thing in the world: Love. Thanks to being the honeymoon destination of newly-married couples, this valley is even regarded as Niagara Fall of Vietnam. The Valley of Love today is located 4 miles away from the center of Dalat, the little Paris, on Phu Dong Thien Vuong St.

attractions.about: Datanla High Rope Course(HRC) Adventure Parks are an answer to the high demand for active tourism in the Nature. Datanla HRC Parks are an original new way to discover the forest environment. Datanla HRC allow anyone to venture from one tree to another via a series of suspended bridges, nets, walkways, barrels, Tarzan bound, flying fox and other fun challenges. A HRC is composed of 3 to 8 circuits. And each circuit includes 8 to 16 challenges.HRC Adventure circuits are designed with graded difficulty levels at the height of 2 to 20 meters,so participants can progress safely, at their own rhythm regardless of skill. Datanla HRC Adventure Parks are accessible to all whatever their level of agility or experience. With different circuits, everyone can find the right circuits for his level and age, or even try the more challenging circuits. Treetop Adventure Parks receive clients from 4 years old to over 70!

stays.name: Terrasse des Roses
stays.address: 35 Cao Ba Quat, Da Lat 670000 Vietnam
stays.about: Luxury Boutique Hotel Terrasse Des Roses: A world class hotel in the heart of nature. The Hotel was awarded the most Beautiful Place in town by the Dalat Governor. Terrasse des Roses is a top-class choice for travelers who would like to enjoy the city with a luxury charm.Set 2 km from the excitement of the city, this 4 star hotels is not only the favorite place for Vietnamese Events and Media Industry where many famous movies have been filmed but also an excellent location and provides access to the city's biggest attractions. Terrasse des Roses is located in a large beautiful garden with a variety of flowers bringing to our clients a calming experience and peace of mind.

stays.name: Dreams Hotel
stays.address: 141 & 138-140 Phan Dinh Phung St, Da Lat 670000 Vietnam
stays.about: The Dreams Hotels are situated close to the city centre. A full breakfast and free internet are included in the price. All rooms have bathroom, cable TV, mini bar, AC heater and telephone.

stays.name: Zen Cafe Lakeside
stays.address: Dao Nguyen Village, Da Lat 670000 Vietnam
stays.about: Large, clean and comfortable rooms in the middle of the nature on one of the most beautiful lakes of Vietnam invite you to relax. The rooms are over 40m2, each with 3 panoramic windows, TV, Wifi, a sitting set on the balcony. Also suitable for longer stays. Every daytime and every weather is an experience. The bathroom is generously designed and has under the rain shower a view over the lake.

stays.name: Hai Long Vuong Hotel
stays.address: Lot 6 Tran Le Street Ward 4, Da Lat 61000 Vietnam
stays.about: If you are traveling around the world with a budget. If you are looking a good hotel, cheap prices for stay and if you are looking for an experience to exchange your culture with local Vietnamese In Da Lat.

stays.name: Dalat Sky Hostel
stays.address: 27 Vo Thi Sau, Ward 2, Da Lat 670000 Vietnam
stays.about: Dalat Sky Hostel has developed a unique, fun, family environment with private room and dorm rooms which every detail designed (bright window, free electricity, light, private curtain). It would suit those who are looking for a relaxed, friendly atmosphere and the opportunity to meet new people. You will be greeted by super friendly staff, clean facilities and awesome Bar and Rooftop lounge that will change your image of a hostel. We invite free lunch when you arrive. Family dinner time is also the chance for you learn how to make local food, or you can eat and make friends with crazily friendly friends from all over the world waiting for your arrival in the cozy lobby. Dalat Sky Hostel, located in Dalat City Center, is in a quiet, local neighbourhood with a nice view of the city. Here, you will be able to experience Vietnamese life from inside. It's about 10 minute walk to the central market where can try the local food, go shopping. The hostel is next to coffee places, restaurants, bars, tourist attractions and 2 minutes from the bus station. Tickets / tours are available from reception, as well as laundry

stays.name: Dalat Edensee Resort & Spa
stays.address: Tuyen Lam Lake, Zone VII.2, Da Lat Vietnam
stays.about: The Resort offers 112 rooms which are set up in three distinct categories and villas. The European designed villas with all international standard amenities and equipment are situated within three different areas. Furthermore is each room category named after a flower from our local landscape.All villas are surrounded by natural landscaping; bursting with Dalat flowers and most offer a view of the beautiful Tuyen Lam Lake.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Ana Mandara Villas Dalat Resort & Spa
stays.address: Le Lai Street, Ward 5, Da Lat 61000 Vietnam
stays.about: Seventeen villas line cobble-stone roads and verdant gardens built in the 1920s and 1930s. In the valley below is the French art deco city of Dalat. Beyond are distant mountains, a cool blue sky, and later, a starry night. Ana Mandara Villas Dalat Resort & Spa is well located for you to enjoy exploring the surrounding landscaped areas and local culture and farming countryside. Meticulously preserved and bursting with character, Ana’s villas aim to bring you back to bygone years and forgotten times when a day was spent walking along a grassy knoll or dozing off by a crackling fireplace.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: ZEN Valley Dalat
stays.address: 38 Khe Sanh - Ward 10, Da Lat 670000 Vietnam
stays.about: Bungalows and Guest Rooms in a very quiet valley on the outskirts. The panoramic view is always an experience. Cloud images reminiscent of old children's book images. Golden-orange sunrises can start wonderful days and the early sunsets are indescribably beautiful. On foot, on bicycles, motorcycles or cars can achieve so numerous and interesting destinations. We support you and in detail at the day's activities. The Cafe in the ZEN Valley offer a full breakfast and anytime snacks and large meals in the best quality and quantity. Drinks are available in large variety and our coffee in Vietnamese tradition or as cappuccino or latte precedes a good reputation. Us the well-being of our guests is very important, we look forward to anyone who wants to spend a few days in the ZEN Valley. For questions regarding the arrival and departure we are happy to help.

stays.name: Cam Ly Homestay
stays.address: 3/62 Dao Duy Tu Ward 4, Da Lat 760000 Vietnam
stays.about: Hello, my name is Tri and I would love to host you and your friends to visit my beautiful town in the mountains. I have been in tourism for many years and can customize tours to fit your budget. As a previous guide of waterfall repelling/canyoning, rock climbing, Easyrider tour guide and now I have a warm and clean place to invite you to stay at my home ( Private room and Dormitory ). I love to host all nationalities and strive for a five star rating, so let me know how I can help your stay be the best in Da Lat. Things to note & policies: Free Cancellation: 3 Days before the arrival without being charged by the property Check in from 1:00pm Check out Before 11:00am Payment on Arrival: Cash and Credit Card, but extra Charge for credit card service fee. Tax Included.

stays.name: Swiss-Belresort Tuyen Lam Dalat
stays.address: Zone 7&8, Tuyen Lam Lake Tourist Area, Ward 3,, Da Lat Vietnam
stays.about: Surrounded by hills, Swiss-Belresort Tuyen Lam, Dalat has an exceptional landscape and rural environment. Designed as a botanical garden, it offers an exquisite surrounding for this upscale international resort. Designed in an Anglo-Normand rural style and surrounded by the 18-hole golf course, it is a sight to behold while walking on the fairways.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Crazy House
stays.address: 03 Huynh Thuc Khang St Ward 4, Da Lat Vietnam
stays.about: See why so many travelers make Crazy House their guest house of choice when visiting Da Lat. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a charming setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.Guest rooms offer a desk, a seating area, and a fireplace, and Hang Nga Guesthouse Hotel makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the guest house, including a 24 hour front desk, room service, and baggage storage. As an added convenience, there is parking available to guests.Close to some of Da Lat's most popular landmarks, such as Bao Dai's Palace (0.3 mi) and Domaine de Marie Church (1.0 mi), Crazy House is a great destination for tourists.While visiting Da Lat, you may want to try some ribs at one of the nearby restaurants, such as Wooden House, Barn House BBQ and BEER, or Thanh Thuy Blue Water Restaurant.Da Lat is also known for some great architectural buildings, including Dalat Railway Station and Dinh I Da Lat, which are not too far from Hang Nga Guesthouse Hotel.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Crazy House as you experience all of the things Da Lat has to offer.

stays.name: Da Lat Mr. Happy Homestay
stays.address: 252 To Hien Thanh, Da Lat Vietnam

stays.name: Mr Rot Hotel
stays.address: H56 Nguyen Thi Nghia Street, Ward 2, Da Lat Vietnam
stays.about: Mr Rot's secret hotel is a brand new hotel,built 2016.run by the famous guide named: Mr Rot who organizes the famous Secret tour at the villa pinkhouse hotel that highly recommened on internet by travellers.This is the idea that many travellers come to Da lat for it.Located in a quiet valley by the centre lake.right in the heart of the city centre.It takes 5 minutes to the centre maket by walk.

stays.name: Sammy Dalat Hotel
stays.address: 1 Le Hong Phong Street District 4, Da Lat Vietnam
stays.about: Welcome to Sammy Dalat Hotel, your Da Lat “home away from home.” Sammy Dalat Hotel aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.Close to some of Da Lat's most popular landmarks, such as Bao Dai's Palace (0.4 mi) and Lam Vien Square (0.9 mi), Sammy Dalat Hotel is a great destination for tourists.Rooms at Sammy Dalat Hotel offer a minibar providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi.A concierge and room service are some of the conveniences offered at this hotel. A fitness center and free breakfast will also help to make your stay even more special. If you are driving to Sammy Dalat Hotel, free parking is available.During your visit, be sure to check out a popular Da Lat oyster restaurant such as Da Quy Restaurant, which is a short distance from Sammy Dalat Hotel.During your visit, be sure to check out Crazy House (0.2 mi), which is a popular attraction within walking distance of the hotel.Sammy Dalat Hotel puts the best of Da Lat at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

stays.name: Robins Villa
stays.address: 20 Tran Binh Trong Ward 5, Da Lat Vietnam
stays.about: Robins Villa is your oasis in the city of Da Lat... Enjoy being downtown, but still have the peace and quiet of the country. Our Villa is located a short 15 minute walk (3 min taxi) from the the Da Lat Market. For the more adventurous, we have bicycle and scooter rentals right onsite. Our large, clean, comfortable rooms overlook our beautiful gardens and koi pond and will give you the wonderful nights sleep you need to go exploring the next day. In the morning, head downstairs to our “Sea To Sky Bistro” for a full breakfast menu, or call room service and enjoy breakfast on your balcony every morning between 7:00 and 10:00 am. All our rooms and common areas "inside" the villa are all 100% non-smoking. With airport transfers, bus and train tickets and tour planning help, our English and Vietnamese speaking host’s will keep all your Vietnamese experience's hassle free. Come, enjoy your stay. Your oasis awaits!

stays.name: Sai Gon -  Da Lat
stays.address: 180, 3 Thang 2 Str, Da Lat 84 63 Vietnam
stays.about: Looking for a place to stay in Da Lat? Then look no further than Saigon - Dalat, a family-friendly hotel that brings the best of Da Lat to your doorstep.Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV, a refrigerator, and air conditioning, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel.Saigon - Dalat features a concierge and room service, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a pool and free breakfast. If you are driving to Saigon - Dalat, free parking is available.Close to some of Da Lat's most popular landmarks, such as Bao Dai's Palace (0.5 mi) and Linh Son Pagoda (0.9 mi), Saigon - Dalat is a great destination for tourists.While in Da Lat be sure to experience local oyster favorites at Da Quy Restaurant.During your visit, be sure to check out Crazy House (0.2 mi), which is a popular attraction within walking distance of the hotel.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Saigon - Dalat as you experience everything Da Lat has to offer.

stays.name: La Sapinette Hotel Dalat
stays.address: 01 Phan Chu Trinh Street, Ward 9, Da Lat Vietnam
stays.about: La Sapinette Hotel Dalat is a 4 star hotel just build in Dec 2009, 91 well appointed with French Art Nouveau design included 32" LCD TV, Safe box and bath tub in all rooms, three-minute car ride from the central market.Guests can enjoy the cozy and tranquil atmosphere with 02 restaurant for Vietnamese and European cuisine, Gym, Spa and night chit chat at the Bar On the Rock.

stays.name: Villa Pink House
stays.address: 7 Hai Thuong Street, Da Lat Vietnam
stays.about: If you’re looking for a budget friendly guest house in Da Lat, look no further than Villa Pink House.Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Linh Son Pagoda (0.6 mi) and Bao Dai's Palace (0.8 mi), guests of Villa Pink House Hotel can easily experience some of Da Lat's most well known attractions.Villa Pink House Hotel is a budget friendly guest house offering a flat screen TV, a minibar, and a desk in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.The guest house features a 24 hour front desk, baggage storage, and currency exchange. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.If you’re looking for a seafood restaurant, consider a visit to Fungi Chingu Restaurant, Moulin Rouge, or Ốc Nhé, which are all conveniently located a short distance from Villa Pink House.Best of all, Villa Pink House makes it easy to experience many great Da Lat attractions like Da Lat King Palace I and Lam Dong Museum, which are some popular history museums.The staff at Villa Pink House looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

Terrasse des Roses is a top-class choice for travelers who would like to enjoy the city with a luxury charm.Set 2 km from the excitement of the city, this 4 star hotels is not only the favorite place for Vietnamese Events and Media Industry where many famous movies have been filmed but also an excellent location and provides access to the city's biggest attractions. Terrasse des Roses is located in a large beautiful garden with a variety of flowers bringing to our clients a calming experience and peace of mind.

stays.name: Hotel Dai Loi (Fortune Hotel)
stays.address: 3A Bui Thi Xuan, Da Lat Vietnam
stays.about: Welcome to Hotel Dai Loi (Fortune Hotel), your Da Lat “home away from home.” Hotel Dai Loi (Fortune Hotel) aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.Close to some of Da Lat's most popular landmarks, such as Linh Son Pagoda (0.4 mi) and Lam Vien Square (0.7 mi), Hotel Dai Loi is a great destination for tourists.You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer a flat screen TV and a refrigerator, and you can stay connected during your stay as Hotel Dai Loi (Fortune Hotel) offers guests free wifi.The hotel features a 24 hour front desk, baggage storage, and currency exchange. Plus, Hotel Dai Loi (Fortune Hotel) offers free breakfast, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.Travelers looking to enjoy some tempura can head to Restaurant Ichi. Otherwise, you may want to check out a Mediterranean restaurant such as Primavera Italian Restaurant, Emai Dalat, or The Sky Over Dalat.During your visit, be sure to check out popular attractions like Crazy House (1.0 mi), Thien Vien Truc Lam (1.0 mi), and Dalat Flower Park (0.6 mi), which are all within walking distance of the hotel.Hotel Dai Loi (Fortune Hotel) puts the best of Da Lat at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

stays.name: Tulip Hotel Dalat II
stays.address: 14 Nguyen Chi Thanh Street, Da Lat Vietnam
stays.about: Tulip Hotel Dalat II is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Da Lat, offering many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.Nearby landmarks such as Linh Son Pagoda (0.6 mi) and Lam Vien Square (0.7 mi) make Tulip Hotel Dalat II a great place to stay when visiting Da Lat.Guest rooms offer a minibar, a refrigerator, and a seating area, and Tulip Hotel Dalat II makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the small hotel, including a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service. As an added convenience, there is parking available to guests.If you like seafood restaurants, Tulip Hotel Dalat II is conveniently located near Fungi Chingu Restaurant, Moulin Rouge, and Ốc Nhé.Da Lat is also home to Dalat Flower Park, a popular garden that is not too far from Tulip Hotel Dalat II.Enjoy your stay in Da Lat!

stays.about: Terracotta Hotel & Resort Dalat is an oasis of activities & facilities for meeting and leisure purpose. The Western design is in harmony with the nature, covered by green foliage An ideal location, overlooking the gentle Tuyen Lam lake and 10 minutes by car to Dalat city. Featuring 240 rooms and 21 villas which are the most number of hotel rooms in town. Complimentary WIFI, tennis court day-time, indoor swimming pool, gym, kid-club and daily scheduled shuttle bus to Dalat city

stays.name: TTC Hotel - Ngoc Lan
stays.address: 42 Nguyen Chi Thanh Street, Da Lat 670000 Vietnam
stays.about: Greetings from beautiful Dalat city ! Dalat, the city of Eternal Spring, with its wonderful climate and famous natural beauty spots, has become the summer resort of Vietnam, the romantic honeymoon destination and the marriage anniversary rendezvous for decades. Perfectly located in the heart of Dalat with stunning views of the picturesque Xuan Huong lake, Ngoc Lan hotel has been a favourite amongst travellers to Dalat. Guests to the hotel can now enjoy the completely new and luxurious hotel with the exquisite warmth and hospitality brought by the attentive and professional staff. The hotel is the perfect place for conducting both leisure and business. The guest services are always ready, and the meeting and banquet facilities are well equipped to cater to your every need.

stays.about: The Lake House Dalat places at Tuyen Lam lake with beautiful view and green. It's 7km from the center, 2km from Datanla Water Fall, 200m from Thien Vien Truc Lam. You might take a boat tour around the lake. Our guests may join with us for lunch, dinner. We also serve free breakfast for all guest. Come and enjoy your holiday

attractions.about: Vinpearl Safari Park – Vietnam’s largest wildlife conservation park . Nestled in Bai Dai, the Northwest coast of Phu Quoc Island, Vinpearl Safari Park, boasting to be Vietnam’s largest zoological park, conserve abundant indigenous and exotic flora and fauna. stays.about: Named the BEST HOTEL ON PHU QUOC 2018 and TOP 10 BEST HOTELS 2018 WORLDWIDE by Northern European travel companies, Cassia Cottage is a place where guests can truly switch off and unwind. This boutique beach resort features 58 tastefully furnished rooms and cottages. All are complete with all the amenities of a premium hotel, aside from a television. Large open spaces, lush gardens of spices and flowers, together with warm genuine local hospitality lend Cassia Cottage its hallmark relaxing and carefree ambiance; making it a meditative sanctuary where the modern pace of life washes out to sea.

The area also boasts Vinpearl Land amusement park, Vinpearl Golf and Vinpearl Safari as well as a convention center and casino complex.

Mango Bay is tucked away off the beaten track, with Vietnam's first rammed earth bungalows, enclosed by beach and protected forest. There are no air-cons, television sets or telephones in the rooms for a true fusion with nature at the island's first eco-friendly resort. All rooms and bungalows have open sea views and offer mosquito nets.

Chen Sea Resort & Spa lies perfectly along a private and pristine beach offering privacy and serenity, everything is about peace and heaven. The Architecture of the Resort is inspired by the local environment with the use of natural material that is traditional to Vietnam. Chen Sea Resort & Spa offers 36 unique and spacious Villas. The open plan layout design invites our guests for both indoor and outdoor experience. Traditional oriental simplicity and refinement are the inspiration for the design and furnishings of all the villas.

stays.about: See why so many travelers make Isabella Resort their hotel of choice when visiting Ong Lang. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a romantic setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer air conditioning and a minibar, and you can stay connected during your stay as Isabella Resort offers guests free wifi.Plus, Isabella Resort offers an on-site restaurant, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.While in Ong Lang, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Isabella Resort, including Bittersweet Bistro - Cocktail. Food and Music (0.3 mi), Sunrise Bar (0.3 mi), and Bird of Paradise (0.4 mi).Ong Lang is also home to Phu Quoc Gallery of Contemporary Art (GoCA), a popular art gallery that is not too far from Isabella Resort.At Isabella Resort, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Ong Lang.

stays.name: Radisson Blu Resort Phu Quoc
stays.address: Ganh Dau Beach, Phu Quoc Island 920000 Vietnam
stays.about: Nestled in a serene seafront setting on Phu Quoc’s idyllic northwest coast, Vietnam’s first Radisson Blu resort overlooks white sands, azure waters and verdant mountains. Guests are offered a choice of 514 rooms, suites and villas, ranging from 43 to 635 square meters, all featuring a contemporary design, private balconies or terraces, high-end amenities and cutting-edge technology including complimentary Wi-Fi. All guests will enjoy views over the resort’s tropical gardens, pool, water park, mountains or sea. The ten beachfront villas promise stylish and purposeful living, with two, three or six bedrooms, large living areas, full kitchens, dining areas and private outdoor pools - perfect for getaways and special occasions. Located off the country’s south coast, Phu Quoc is Vietnam’s largest island and one of Asia’s most exciting up-and-coming tourist destinations. Resort facilities include an inviting lagoon-style infinity pool, a Kid’s Club, plus four innovative F&B outlets.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Green Bay Phu Quoc Resort & Spa
stays.address: Cua Can Hamlet, Ong Lang, Phu Quoc Island Vietnam
stays.about: From the moment we first walked through an uninhabited tropical forest on Phu Quoc Island and discovered a pristine beach in a secluded coral bay boasting panoramic views across the Gulf of Thailand, we were inspired to create Green Bay Resort. We immediately had a vision of an eco-conscious, five-star boutique resort that nurtured the natural beauty of one of the secluded Vietnam beaches. Our goal was to develop a world class resort in Phu Quoc without disturbing the island’s enchanting, rustic aura. Our luxurious lodgings incorporate natural and sustainably-sourced materials while featuring all of the modern amenities that guests would expect from a superlative boutique holiday experience . Every day you will see a team of gardeners carefully maintaining the bucolic beauty throughout the resort. Each and every detail throughout our resort – from the serene setting of our spa through the restaurants and to the infinity pool bar that overlooks a pristine shoreline and the turquoise waters of a coral fringed-bay, guests will appreciate how Green Bay Resort strives to protect its most precious asset: the natural beauty of Phu Quoc Island.
