stays.name: Anja Beach Resort & Spa
stays.address: Tran Hung Dao, Ap Cua Lap Cua Lap, Duong To Commune, Duong Dong, Phu Quoc Island 920000 Vietnam
stays.about: Nestled within private gardens, Anja Beach Resort & Spa offers accommodation with a private beach area in Duong To. It features an outdoor swimming pool. Guests can enjoy meals at the in-house restaurant or having lunch and drink at Sim Bar. Free use of bicycles to explore the surrounding area (reservation is needed) The nearest airport is Phu Quoc International Airport, 3 km away . Certain rooms include a seating area where you can relax. Enjoy a cup of tea from your balcony or patio. The rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV and every room has a private bathroom, bathtub, shower, bathrobes, slippers and free amenities. Guests can approach the 24-hour front desk for tour arrangements, information and daily housekeeping services. Free Airport transfer (flight details is needed at least 24 hours before arrival time)

stays.name: Sea Star Resort
stays.address: 98/2 Tran Hung Dao Street, Duong Dong, Phu Quoc Island 950000 Vietnam
stays.about: Sea Star Resort Phu Quoc is situated on the beautiful Long Beach, offers simple and comfy accommodation with free WiFi access in its public areas. The resort is proud to have the nicest stretch of Long Beach with natural shade from Malabar almond and coco trees. It was designed its rooms and bungalows with respect for the environment and sensitivity to local culture, a combination designed to give our guests a peaceful and rewarding experience. We strive to exceed the expectations of our guests in every facet of our service. This means bigger rooms with spacious veranda, genuine local hospitality, complete tranquility and excellent value for money. Trip for leisure, recreation and holiday purposes, Sea Star Resort is an excellent choice for your stay in Phu Quoc Island.

stays.name: Ancarine Beach Resort
stays.address: Group 3, Ong Lang Beach, Cua Duong, Phu Quoc Island Vietnam
stays.about: Located in the Ong Lang Beach and tropical forest, Ancarine Beach Resort offers rooms and bungalows with view to the sea. All guestrooms and bungalows are equipped with a flat-screen TV, AC, beach towels and free daily bottled water. En-suite bathrooms come with a rain shower and free toiletries. The resort is about 8 km from Duong Dong Town, 10 km from Duong Dong Night Market. It is 20 km from Phu Quoc International Airport and 25 km from Bai Vong Pier. Airport/pier transfers are available, while on-site parking is free. Its restaurant serves both Vietnamese and European cuisines. Laundry and ironing services are additionally provided. Luggage can be stored at the reception. Services are rated exceptional with friendly, attentive staff.

stays.name: The Shells Resort and Spa Phu Quoc
stays.address: Ganh Gio Beach, Duong Dong, Phu Quoc Island Vietnam
stays.about: Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Duong Dong, The Shells Resort and Spa Phu Quoc is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV, a minibar, and air conditioning, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the resort. The Shells Resort and Spa Phu Quoc features a concierge and room service, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a pool and breakfast. If you are driving to The Shells Resort and Spa Phu Quoc, free parking is available. Nestled on the pristine tear-shaped Island, The Shells Resort & Spa beachfront resort in Phu Quoc brings guests into a truly relaxing & party atmosphere. Contemporary and minimal in design driven by the shell-shaped concept, open and harmonious with nature, The Shells pictures a serene and peaceful landscape where nature and human are one and ‘hustles and bustles’ is not in the dictionary of our guests. Life at the Shells Resort & Spa is fulfilled with various activities from diving the reefs, kayaking in the bays or just living the life of a lotus eater by lounging on the beach, Indulging in a massage or embrace in our party ambiance with themed gourmet dinner on fresh seafood. Come and unveil the Beauty in the Hidden Gem. Come and unveil the Beauty in the Hidden Gem.

stays.name: Bauhinia Resort Phu Quoc
stays.address: Lot 10, Alley 91, Tran Hung Dao Street, Duong Dong, Phu Quoc Island 920000 Vietnam
stays.about: When visiting Phu Quoc Island, you'll feel right at home at Bauhinia Resort, which offers quality accommodation and great service. Located in the heart of Duong Dong Town, Phu Quoc Island, this hotel is 0.7 km from Phu Quoc Beach and within 1.5 km of Dinh Cau Temple and Dinh Cau Night Market.

stays.name: Palmy Beach Club Resort
stays.address: Tran Hung Dao Street, Cua Lap, Duong To, Phu Quoc Island 920000 Vietnam
stays.about: At Palmy Beach Club Resort you will enjoy at the beach, take a walk on the private beach or in the beautiful infinity pool, get the tropical cocktails, and dance under the dazzling stars. The Resort is fully equipped with conveniences, from the layout of the adjacent swimming pool restaurant and bar with Billiard entertainment area, Table football to help you to relax

stays.name: Nam Nghi Phu Quoc
stays.address: Hamlet 4, Cua Can, Phu Quoc Island 920000 Vietnam
stays.about: On the northwestern shore of Phu Quoc lies Nam Nghi, a modern, luxury retreat surrounded by untouched nature. From sparkling, turquoise waters to pristine, light golden-sand beaches and lush forests, Nam Nghi resort affords its guests magnificent views of the spectacular landscapes this tropical island has to offer. The resort’s stunning grounds boast a combination of natural elements and tasteful, environmentally sustainable architecture, emphasizing both natural materials and contemporary Vietnamese design. Beyond Nam Nghi’s own private sanctuary, Phu Quoc is a beautiful island oasis as well as an up-and-coming tourism destination in its own right. Known as the “Pearl of Vietnam,” this rustic island is home to both picturesque beaches and dense, tropical jungle, providing travellers with ample opportunity for both relaxation and adventure. As of November 1, 2019, Nam Nghi Phu Quoc offers complimentary scheduled round-trip airport transfers on a sharing arrangement as following details: • From airport to resort: shuttled vans are in service every 2 hour from 9:00 to 19:00 • From resort to airport: shuttled vans are in service every 2 hour from 8:00 to 18:00.

stays.name: Movenpick Resort Waverly Phu Quoc
stays.address: Ong Lang, Phu Quoc Island 920000 Vietnam
stays.about: Step into paradise at the 5-star Movenpick Resort Waverly Phu Quoc, located on Ong Lang beach on the west coast of the island. Whether you are looking for a family adventure, a romantic getaway or a group incentive trip, you will find everything you need right here at our family lifestyle resort. Our culinary team invite you to explore the restaurant, bars and beach club offering our signature dishes, innovative cocktails and of course the famous Movenpick “Chocolate Hour”. Relax by the pool, unwind with a massage, embark on a culinary journey and simply enjoy the tranquil surroundings. We can guarantee you will have a memorable island experience. No trip to Phu Quoc would be the same without experiencing the spectacular sunsets so sit back, sip and savor the breathtaking view. The Residence and The Villas are located within the resort. Please check out Movenpick Residences Phu Quoc for more details. At Mövenpick Resort Waverly Phu Quoc, we make moments.

stays.name: Salinda Resort Phu Quoc Island
stays.address: Cua Lap Hamlet, Duong To Commune, Phu Quoc Island Vietnam
stays.about: With a dedication to providing outstanding hospitality, Salinda Resort is a five-star boutique resort, located on the prime location on Phu Quoc Island with stunning views on romantic sunsets. The resort features 121 luxury rooms, suites and villas designed in contemporary style with added local touch that creates an almost seamless transition from the inside out, all whilst being surrounded by the elegance and simplicity of the island’s natural environment. Salinda Resort has three unique restaurants with its distinctive venue concept and specialty Head Chef; and an authentic Thai spa with signature treatments, such as the pearl massage or warm herbal compress that pays tribute to Phu Quoc Island natural ingredients and ancient Thai wellness secrets. An infinity salt-filtrated pool near a private golden beach overlooks breathtaking sunset, sprinkled with palm trees that cast a natural shade. Surrender to the allure of island life at Salinda Resort!

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: 9 Station Hostel & Bar Phu Quoc
stays.address: 91/3 Tran Hung Dao Street, Duong Dong, Phu Quoc Island 920000 Vietnam
stays.about: 9Station Hostel is an incredible accommodation for backpackers/travelers stay in the Phu Quoc Island. Located in Duong Dong- Downtown which is taken few minutes walking to the beach. You will find a common huge lounge and swimming pool where you can have unforgettable moment to chill and to interact with others from all around the world at the property. The Hostel not only provides motorbike/scooter and bicycle rental but also the tour to the small islands where you can experience snorkeling, swimming, fishing. The nearest airport is Phu Quoc International Airport, 5 km from the property. We also offer: - FREE WIFI. - FREE computers for guest use. - FREE laundry. - 24 Hour Reception. - HAPPY HOURS for Drinks every day. - Chill-out Lounge with a pool table, foosball and comfy nature wood sofas. - Swimming pool in the garden. - Large TVs at the Lounge so you don’t miss out on your favourite sports. - Outdoor tables with a great view. - Nature wood benches along the corridors. - Outside BBQ activities with local fresh raw materials. - 9Station Designated Private Boat Tour- 9TOUR with Fishing, Snorkeling, Swimming activities. - 9DINNER - a good opportunity for those who desire to share traveling info and to make some new friends. GO HERB and BE WILD!!! We have awesome crews who are ready to help with all your travel needs and of course we can’t forget to mention that we are the home of the 9Station Private Boat Tour- 9TOUR to the small islands surrounding the main Phu Quoc Island! We look forward to showing you an unforgettable stay in the Phu Quoc Island! Join us and experience!!! THE 9STATION HOSTEL CREW!!!

stays.name: Pullman Vung Tau
stays.address: 15 Thi Sach Street Thang Tam Ward, Vung Tau Vietnam
stays.about: Pullman Vung Tau is the first 5 star international hotel in Vung Tau City. It is just 1.5 hour drive away and closest beach destination from Ho Chi Minh City. It offers 356 rooms and suites featuring Pullman signature standard with spectacular ocean views over the Back Beach as well as the Front Beach. The hotel has 1 all day dining restaurant with international cuisine, bars and bakery. It has 2 stories conference centre catering up to 1,200 participants, fit lounge and outdoor swimming pool.

stays.name: The Imperial Hotel & Resort Vung Tau
stays.address: 159 Thuy Van Street, Vung Tau 790000 Vietnam
stays.about: The IMPERIAL Hotel and Resort is the first and the only 5-star hotel & resort with its own private beach and fabulous Beach Club in Vung Tau city. Situated on its own stretch of private sandy beach in the seaside resort town of Vung Tau, The IMPERIAL Hotel and Resort is truly an art boutique hotel, completely unique in concept and design. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a romantic setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you. Rooms at The Imperial Hotel and Resort Vung Tau offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free WiFi. Room service and a concierge are some of the conveniences offered at this hotel. A pool and free breakfast will also help to make your stay even more special. If you are driving to The Imperial Hotel and Resort Vung Tau, free parking is available with 24 hours security surveillance. Close to some of Vung Tau's most popular landmarks, such as The Vung Tau War Heroes Shrine (0.4 mi) and The Whale Temple (0.8 mi), The Imperial Hotel and Resort Vung Tau is a great destination for tourists. If you’re looking for a steakhouse, consider a visit to RuSeasons restaurant-club or Riviera Restaurant, which are all conveniently located a short distance from The Imperial Hotel Vung Tau. Should time allow, Thich Ca Phat Dai is a popular historic site that is relatively easy to get to. We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at The Imperial Hotel and Resort Vung Tau as you experience all of the things Vung Tau has to offer.

stays.name: The Wind Boutique Resort
stays.address: B10, 84 Phan Chu Trinh, Vung Tau Vietnam
stays.about: Escape to modern luxury in a peaceful, tropical setting. The Wind is Vung Tau's only Spa Inclusive Resort. We offer personalized service in a space that’s beautiful, peaceful, and surprisingly upscale. Our cliff-side location, waterfalls, and beautiful tropical gardens make The Wind Boutique Resort one of a kind. Our rooms are tastefully decorated and fully equipped with the finest items - modern kitchens, 50” LCDs, and leather couches. Every room is unique and has been carefully designed for your comfort. Relax amongst our multiple waterfalls while the children play in the pool, or enjoy a romantic evening while you take-in the city lights from our cliff overlook bar. And of course we offer high speed internet everywhere on the property, so you’re only as removed as you wish to be. Our other facilities include an outdoor pool, steam room, sauna, billiards, jacuzzi, pool bar, and children's shallow swimming area. We have a free shuttle service to the shops, beaches, and amenities around town, and we’re within 5 minutes walk to a selection of restaurants nearby. Front beach is 1.1km while back beach is 1.8km.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Fusion Suites Vung Tau
stays.address: 02 Truong Cong Dinh Ward 2, Vung Tau 790000 Vietnam
stays.about: Fusion Suites Vung Tau brings originality and a wellness inspired hotel to the seaside town of Vung Tau. It has set a new trend with 170 stylish suites, studios and apartments with expansive ocean and mountain views. Featuring daily spa treatments at no extra cost, yoga classes, fitness center, 8 uniquely designed sky pools and a rooftop infinity pool. You can enjoy breakfast, lunch or dinner in the 19th floor restaurant "Fresh" with 360 degree views or indulge in a few cocktails in the best rooftop bar in town "Breeze". The ground floor features “Fusion Courtyard" with a café, weekend burger bar, bubble tea station and wine shop. Fusion Suites also offers banquet meeting rooms for up to 240 people.Only 2 hours drive from Saigon by road or direct ferry, Fusion Suites Vung Tau is ideal for families, couples, groups and solos looking to swap urban bustle for coastal calm without involving a trip to the airport.If you are looking for a modern hotel in a great location with exceptional food and beverage outlets, premium spa and a friendly team - then Fusion Suites Vung Tau is your destination!

Especially, it is extremely favorable to come from Muong Thanh Vung Tau to Ho Chi Minh City with a hydrofoil pier hundreds of meter far away from the hotel. The hotel has full modern amenities and services including gym; outdoor swimming pool; conference rooms; bars; Europe & Asia restaurants with a professional team of chefs who serve well-known seafood dishes; karaoke systems with excellent sound, beautiful decors which make Muong Thanh Vung Tau a reliable address when visiting the Southern sea city.

stays.address: 63 Tran Hung Dao Street Ward 1, Vung Tau 790000 Vietnam
stays.about: Located right in the heart of Vung Tau, Petro House is a boutique business hotel, welcoming both business and leisure guests alike to Vung Tau since the 60’s. Renovated in 2012, the hotel retains the charm of the original colonial architecture, with columns and arch windows. Her spacious guest rooms have been thoroughly modernized, delivering comfort, safety and connectivity.

stays.name: Song Lam Hotel
stays.address: 126N Hoang Hoa Tham St, Ward 2 Vung Tau City, Vung Tau 8464 Vietnam
stays.about: Ideal for fun and relaxation, Song Lam Hotel is located in the Back Beach area of Vung Tau. From here, guests can enjoy easy access to all that the lively city has to offer. With its convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the city's must-see destinations. Song Lam Hotel offers impeccable service and all the essential amenities to invigorate travelers. While lodging at this wonderful property, guests can enjoy free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, taxi service, ticket service, 24-hour front desk and more 24h minimart, restaurats. Guests can choose from 30 rooms, all of which exude an atmosphere of total peace and harmony. The hotel's recreational facilities, which include golf course (within 3 km), massage are designed for escape and relaxation. Song Lam Hotel is a smart choice for travelers to Vung Tau, offering a relaxed and hassle-free stay every time.

attractions.about:
LeBaDang Art Foundation is located at 15 LeLoi_Hue  by Perfume Riverside.

There are 400 works and collections exhibited and stored in two floor of Foundation.

When you come in to LeBaDang's space, you will be admire a  new world, unique and impression. His art works mostly make full use of various color with impressive , soulful and vital languages on various materials, innovative and novel. His works not only drawn on paper, but also sculpture, carved and creates a variety of unique models by inox, wood, stainless steel, American B52 wreck, metal and concrete.

LeBaDang's Art is a lissome and elegant beauty combination of two Eastern and Western cultures.

We are friendly, enthusiastic, dynamical and profession staffs will bring to the visitors  feel attractive and impressive when admiring and discovering LBD's contemporary Art.

The LeBaDang Art foundation hope will be the ideal destination for visitors!!!!!

stays.name: Alba Spa Hotel
stays.address: 29 Tran Quang Khai St., Hue Vietnam
stays.about: Alba Spa Hotel is located in the heart of Hue, just some minutes away from Perfume River, and within walking distance to flight ticketing offices. The hotel has 58 rooms well equipped at 4-star service. As a unique feature, you can indulge yourself in large 12-seater hot and cold baths filled with famous Alba hotspring mineral water which has proven therapeutic benefits for body and skin followed by massage and spa treatments conceived by our French spa consultant Florence Jaffre. In addition to free wifi, conference room, parking and bar, the Madam Chau restaurant is offering tasty Western and Vietnamese dishes from our Chef's a-la-carte list or set menu list. If you stay several days in Alba Spa Hotel, please pamper yourself in our Alba Hot Springs Resort, where activity rhymes with serenity. Let our precious mineral hot springs and outdoor activities such as zipline, high wire course, wave pool, traditional crafts, etc... At our Fitness and Wellness parks bring you in-depth detox and rejuvenation for your body and mind.

stays.name: Nam Phuong Riverside Villa
stays.address: 77A Han Mac Tu, Hue 530000 Vietnam
stays.about: Beautiful location, south facing villa facing the river as it is. Friendly and nice surrounding with quiet space but with balcony facing to river side and villa with small yard enough for you to relax after a tiring trip. Outdoor party and beer. Near the center is just 700 meters from the hotel. From here you can go sightseeing city very easily but have quiet space. Come and experience with us

stays.name: Hue Riverside Villa
stays.address: 16/7 Nguyen Cong Tru, Hue 530000 Vietnam
stays.about: Our hotel is situated on the bank of the tranquil and picturesque Nhu Y River, embedded in the background of the legendary Thon Vy village well noted in our national poetry for its charming rural landscape. From the hotel’s windows here you may admire the fishersmen’s activity and even hear the soft, curious clacking sound they make trying to frighten the fish into their nets.

stays.name: Vinpearl Hotel Hue
stays.address: 50A Hung Vuong Street, Hue 530000 Vietnam
stays.about: Centrally located in Hue, walking distance to the Perfume River, Vinpearl Hotel Hue offers the ideal accommodation to travellers visiting Hue. Located on top of the Vincom Mall, guests are sure to be in the center of it all.

stays.name: Hue Four Seasons Hotel
stays.address: 6/9 Lane 7 Nguyen Cong Tru Street, Hue 47000 Vietnam
stays.about: Finding an ideal charming small hotel in Hue does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Hue Four Seasons Hotel, a nice option for travelers like you.Guest rooms offer a refrigerator, a minibar, and air conditioning, and Hue Four Seasons Hotel makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the small hotel, including a concierge. In addition, guests can enjoy free breakfast during their visit.Nearby landmarks such as Huyen Tran Princess Temple (0.2 mi) and Tu Dam Pagoda (0.6 mi) make Hue Four Seasons Hotel a great place to stay when visiting Hue.If you’re looking for a French restaurant, consider a visit to Les Jardins de La Carambole, COCOCLUB, or La Boulangerie Francaise, which are all conveniently located a short distance from Hue Four Seasons Hotel.If you’re looking for something to do, Phu Mong Garden House and Hue's Garden Houses are a nice way to spend some time.Hue Four Seasons Hotel puts the best of Hue at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

stays.name: Charming Riverside Hotel
stays.address: 5 Lane 27 Nguyen Sinh Cung Street, Hue 530000 Vietnam
stays.about: Charming Riverside hotel is located in the heart of Hue city, within walking distance of the ancient Truong Tien Bridge overlooking the timeless Huong River, divided by the quaint Hen Islet...The highlights of Charming Riverside hotel include savouring authentic Hue cuisine in our restaurant at the terrace of the hotel, standing here you can have an overall view of Huong river and the city.

stays.name: Hue Serene Palace Hotel
stays.address: 21/42 Nguyen Cong Tru street, Hue 0084 Vietnam
stays.about: A brand new hotel that features luxurious rooms and suites. We offer convenience to our guests by providing modern elevators, restaurants, and other great amenities. Offering fantastic value of money, It is located right in the heart of ancient Hue City , in lovely and small lane ,only a few minutes' walk from Huong River, and lavishly decorated with modern furniture.

stays.name: La Paix Hue
stays.address: No. 8, Lane 139 Nguyen Sinh Cung Vy Da, Hue 53000 Vietnam
stays.about: Nestled in the peaceful Vi Da hamlet, on the banks of Huong River, La paix Hue is born with a passion to offer warm experience to all guests from different parts. You can enjoy the riverfront while having some drinks or breakfast at the Fig Tree Restaurant. Rooms feature wooden or enamel tile flooring. Each room comes with private bathroom and satellite TV. A mini bar and a work desk are also provide

stays.name: Thanh Lich Royal Boutique Hotel
stays.address: 33 Hai Ba Trung Vinh Ninh Ward, Hue 530000 Vietnam
stays.about: Thanh Lich Royal Boutique Hotel is a 4-star standard hotel, features its 105 well-appointed Deluxe rooms and Suites, located at the center of Hue city. The Hotel owns an ideally location in Hue City. The tourists enjoy staying here will get deluxe products of well harmony combination between modern and traditional of Hue’s cultural characters. The decoration is elegant, featuring a distinctive Authentic Vietnamese theme that provides a restive ambience, perfect for travelers who want a relaxing and pleasant holiday. Thanh Lich Royal Boutique Hotel offers elegant and comfortable accommodation with free WiFi access in the entire property. Located just 5-minute drive from Citadel. Fitted with wooden flooring, air-conditioned rooms include a safe, wardrobe, seating area, a minibar and a flat-screen Smart TV with cable multi-channels. All Rooms and suites enjoy city’s panoramic views, and come with a private bathroom equipped with bathtub, hairdryer and free toiletries.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Cherish Hotel
stays.address: 57 Ben Nghe Street, Hue 530000 Vietnam
stays.about: Cherish Hotel includes 11 floors with 98 well-equipped and comfortable rooms, created from stone, brick and Padouk wood. The hotel was designed sensiblly and elegantly in order to bring a relaxing private and comfortable space to guests.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Thanh Lich Hue Hotel
stays.address: 59 Vo Thi Sau, Phu Hoi Ward, Hue 530000 Vietnam
stays.about: Thanh Lich Hue Hotel is located in Hue about 800 metres away from Dong Ba Market. Rooms are well-appointed and bright. Guests also enjoy free WiFi access throughout the property. Each room at Thanh Lich Hue Hotel comes furnished with air conditioning, large windows with direct sunlight, a mini-fridge and a flat-screen cable TV. Bathroom facilities are en suite. All the rooms offer panoramic city views.

stays.name: Gold Hotel Hue
stays.address: 28 Ba Trieu Street, Hue Vietnam
stays.about: Considered the most impressive hotel in Hue, the GOLD hotel is located in the heart center of the ancient city. The hotel offers stunning views of the legendary Perfume River, Ngu Binh Mountain, panorama of Liberty Stadium, Thanh Lam field and famous Trang Tien Bridge.GOLD hotel is close to all the renowned tourist attractions, our 12 storey 93 room hotel is specially equipped with the lasted in equipment and offers luxurious comfort. Four dining outlets including Gold restaurant on second floor, Gold Bar on terrace, AE Restaurant on 8th floor and Pool bar on 4th floor. Moreover, Gold hotel Hue is also fully invested Spa & Massage system, gym and outdoor swimming pool. Meeting rooms here are equipped with sound systems, lighting and free wireless internet.Our friendly and well-trained staffs offer special attentive service to all our guests.We look forward to offering you the “Amazing Experience” of GOLD HOTEL

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Villa Hue
stays.address: 4 Tran Quang Khai St, Hue Vietnam
stays.about: Villa Hue is a boutique hotel and a Practical Training Center for the young students of Hue Tourism College and surrounding rural provinces who wish to embark on a career in the hospitality industry.

stays.name: Hotel Saigon Morin
stays.address: 30 Le Loi St, Hue Vietnam
stays.about: Built in 1901 by French, the Morin Hotel is one of the oldest hotels in Vietnam. Survived through many wars, this is more than a hotel, It's a part of the history of Hue city in the last 110 years. Now lovingly restored to its century-old glory, Saigon Morin is once again ready to live up to its reputation as the choice of celebrities, intrepid adventures and businessmen. The Hotel offers every thing a discerning traveler would expect form a world class hotel without sacrificing the old world charm that made the Morin Hotel legendary.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Hong Thien Hotel 1
stays.address: 35 / 6 Chu Van An, Hue 084 Vietnam
stays.about: Hong Thien Hotel 1 offers elegant and affordable rooms with free internet and flat-screen TVs in Hue’s city centre. Featuring an outdoor pool, it has free parking and a restaurant.Hong Thien 1 has air-conditioned rooms decorated with classic furnishings in neutral colours and carpeted flooring. They have a fridge. Private bathrooms come with hot/cold showers and a hairdryer. Free pick up from the train and bus stations in the city centerOur hotel pick up from7:00Am and 8:00pm.

stays.name: Muong Thanh Holiday Hue Hotel
stays.address: 38 Le Loi Street, Hue Vietnam
stays.about: Muong Thanh Holiday Hue Hotel is a 110 contemporary-room hotel, located conveniently in the center of the city with a superb location by the river, the hotel provides an awe-inspiring panoramic view of the city of Hue, the picturesque Perfume River and Trang Tien Bridge from the hotel’s guest rooms.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Hue Serene Shining Hotel & Spa
stays.address: 57/5 Nguyen Cong Tru street, Hue 100000 Vietnam
stays.about: Our hotel that features luxurious rooms and suites, We offer convenience to our guests by providing modern elevators, restaurants,Bar , Spa and other great amenities. Offering fantastic value of money. It is located right in HUE City , approximityately about 5 minutes walk from Huong river .

stays.name: The Scarlett Boutique Hotel
stays.address: 17/1 Ben Nghe Street, Hue Vietnam
stays.about: See why so many travelers make The Scarlett Boutique Hotel their boutique hotel of choice when visiting Hue. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a boutique setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.The Scarlett Boutique Hotel is a boutique boutique hotel offering a flat screen TV, a refrigerator, and air conditioning in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.The boutique hotel features a concierge and room service. Plus, guests can enjoy breakfast, which has made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Hue.Close to some of Hue's most popular landmarks, such as Huyen Tran Princess Temple (0.2 mi) and Hue Royal Palace (0.5 mi), The Scarlett Boutique Hotel is a great destination for tourists.While in Hue be sure to experience local tempura favorites at Take Japanese Restaurant.There is no shortage of things to do in the area: explore popular architectural buildings such as Thien Mu Pagoda and Dieu De Pagoda.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at The Scarlett Boutique Hotel as you experience all of the things Hue has to offer.

stays.name: Holiday Diamond Hotel
stays.address: Number 6 Lane 14 Nguyen Cong Tru street, Hue 0084 Vietnam
stays.about: Located in the center of Hue city and in little street. Precisely because of this, will give visitors a sense of the quietest, most comfortable, the safest in the middle of downtown...

stays.name: EMM Hotel Hue
stays.address: 15 LY Thuong Kiet Street, Hue 47000 Vietnam
stays.about: Located on Vietnam’s central coast, the UNESCO World Heritage-listed city of Hue is just a 20-minute drive from Phu Bai International Airport. Nestled in the heart of the former imperial capital, ÊMM Hotel Hue is the ideal base to discover Hue’s fascinating history and unique culture with the Perfume River and the Hue Citadel just a few minutes’ walk away.

stays.name: Indochine Palace
stays.address: 105A Hung Vuong Street, Hue 47000 Vietnam
stays.about: Surrounded by the lush exotic garden, INDOCHINE PALACE has set an outstanding landmark in Hue with new standards of excellence. This world class hotel is designed to appeal to the affluent, up-market leisure and business travellers with excellent facilities offering for MICE (meetings, incentives, conferences, and exhibitions). Its luxuriously appointed rooms are spacious starting from 35sqm, highlighted by its 42-inch plasma television and a new generation open bathroom concept. The cosmetics and toiletries carry the exclusive Indochine Palace fragrance. The graphics on every item in the room, from the matchboxes to the in-room dining, reflect the attention to detail that Indochine Palace has paid to all its services and facilities. Most of these items and many other touches are good keepsakes by which you can remember the Indochine. Should any of these items catch your fancy and you wish to keep them, please contact the Gift shop at L'Arcade for assistance.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: ORCHID HOTEL
stays.address: 30A Chu Van An, Hue 47000 Vietnam
stays.about: Orchid Hotel Hue is a popular choice amongst travelers in Hue, whether exploring or just passing through. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Orchid Hotel Hue combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Hue unforgettable.

stays.name: Jade Hotel
stays.address: 43 Hung Vuong, Hue 0543 Vietnam
stays.about: The Jade Hotel is ideally located in the heart of the city on Hung Vuong Road, one of the best shopping streets in Hue. Take off to the end of Hung Vuong to the famous Huong 'Perfume' River and historic Truong Tien Bridge with its magical 7-light changing show each evening. Under the bridge, you can visit the night market, riverside cafes and restaurants, stroll through the beautiful riverside park, and visit the art gallery and University of Hue. The Jade Hotel is certified as two-star by Hue Tourism 2015. It is tastefully decorated and comfortably furnished with sound-proofed windows ensuring our guests feel safe, comfortable and undisturbed while viewing the vibrant city below. Our friendly and professional staff are at your service to meet your travel and accommodation needs with the enthusiasm and charm that is famous in Hue. To serve you is our pleasure. Your satisfaction is our reward.

stays.name: Rosaleen Boutique Hotel
stays.address: 36 Chu Van An Street, Phu Hoi Ward 36 Chu Van An, Hue, Vietnam, Hue 53000 Vietnam
stays.about: Rosaleen Boutique Hotel is situated in the heart of Hue City, less than 5 minutes’ walk from the Perfume River. The Hue Ferry Terminal is a 10-minute walk away. Rooms at Rosaleen Boutique Hotel are spacious and modern. They enjoy fresh, light decor and offer satellite TV and tea and coffee makers. Many rooms feature a balcony with a city view.

stays.name: Alba Spa Hotel
stays.address: 29 Tran Quang Khai St., Hue Vietnam
stays.about: Alba Spa Hotel is located in the heart of Hue, just some minutes away from Perfume River, and within walking distance to flight ticketing offices. The hotel has 58 rooms well equipped at 4-star service. As a unique feature, you can indulge yourself in large 12-seater hot and cold baths filled with famous Alba hotspring mineral water which has proven therapeutic benefits for body and skin followed by massage and spa treatments conceived by our French spa consultant Florence Jaffre. In addition to free wifi, conference room, parking and bar, the Madam Chau restaurant is offering tasty Western and Vietnamese dishes from our Chef's a-la-carte list or set menu list. If you stay several days in Alba Spa Hotel, please pamper yourself in our Alba Hot Springs Resort, where activity rhymes with serenity. Let our precious mineral hot springs and outdoor activities such as zipline, high wire course, wave pool, traditional crafts, etc... At our Fitness and Wellness parks bring you in-depth detox and rejuvenation for your body and mind.

stays.address: 17/34 Nguyen Tri Phuong Phu Hoi, Hue 530000 Vietnam
stays.about: Welcome to SUNNY HOTEL! We would like to show our gratitude towards your spending time learning about and selecting the services of the hotel for your next journey. We hope that the brief but compact information of the hotel would be warmly welcomed. Located in the heart of Hue city with a cool and quiet atmosphere. You can walk to the poetic Huong riverside in a few minutes.

stays.about: Located right in Hue City center, Friendly Hotel offers best service for your stay. Than Thien means Friendly, it is also the Character of our Hotel. Distance to famous places in province:- Dragon Boat on Huong Rive Port: 100m.- Truong Tien Bridge: 700m. Hue Railway Station: 1,5Km- Dong Ba Market: 1,2Km. Hue Citadel: 1,5Km.- Thien Mu Pagoda: 4,0 Km. Tu Duc King Tomb: 8Km- Thuan An Beach: 12Km.

stays.name: Moonlight Hotel Hue
stays.address: 20 Pham Ngu Lao, Hue Vietnam
stays.about: The Moonlight Hotel is conveniently located in the heart of Hue City’s Downtown, within walking distance of Huong River, shopping malls, restaurants and night life. Many beautiful landscapes of Hue City can be accessed from the hotel in 30 minutes or less. Dong Ba market, Citadel and several national monuments are also nearby.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Imperial Hotel
stays.address: 08 Hung Vuong Boulevard, Hue 530000 Vietnam
stays.about: Hue, the ancient capital of the Nguyen Dynasty, is the junction where northern and southern ecosystems meet. Hue boasts charming rivers, verdant hills, ancient pagodas and churches, and a rich history. Hue remains a must-see destination when visiting Vietnam, not only because of its cultural values and history, but also for its beautiful landscape and people. The majestic 16-floor Imperial Hotel Hue is nestled along the famous Perfume River, conveniently close to all the historical sites that this UNESCO World Cultural Heritage city has to offer. Imperial Hotel’s well-appointed rooms and suites come beautifully furnished with classic wooden floors and panoramic river and city views. The extensive hotel facilities comprise of the Hub Beer lounge and Restaurant, the OV Club Casino, Royal Spa, Yoshihara Restaurant, Imperial Restaurant, King's Panorama Rooftop Lounge at 16th Floor, Starlight Lounge - Highest Restaurant in town, four state-of-the-art meeting rooms, and much more. Come and explore the best of Hue has to offer.

stays.about: Located right in the Central of the romantic city Of Hue, only 10 minutes cycling to the Imperial forbidden city and 5 minutes walking to Hue night market, Stop and Go boutique homestay offers cozy rooms which are suitable for couple, business travelers, single stay and family. All our elegant rooms feature an impressive and elegant layout.

attractions.about: Southeast Asia is usually associated with a wet, tropical environment, but, in the area of Mui Ne, Vietnam, lays a beautiful desert. white sandunes is 50km away from mui ne central ,the city of Mui Ne is four hours from Ho Chi Minh City, in the south of the a further 45 minutes,and you arrive at Bau Trang, Bau Trang, or the White Sand Dunes, is one of the only desert areas in Southeast Asia and is a beautiful expanse of dunes and sand. There are no camels here; instead, shepherds herd cows through the sandy expanse. Perhaps the most striking part of the area is a small lagoon covered in lotus flowers. Beside the lake, there is also a small pine forest that makes the wind cool, even in the hot Asian desert.

The authentically-styled, Western-prototyped castle, breathtaking views abound at every turn – mustard in picturesque rolling hills planted with vineyards year-round of every stature dot the landscape of the Sea Links City. Whether you are wine tasters or visitor at the Castle, refreshing the soul of yourself with the unique circling of the medieval style architect with light and cozy atmosphere makes RD Wine Castle the premium destination in Mui Ne for Passionate Travelers and Wine Connoisseurs. Enjoy a tour of tasting senses throughout the Castle. We can’t bring to you the Napa Valley but we are sure to deliver the premium standing tasting technique for your winery experience. For Connoisseurs and Wine Lovers, sips after sips of Chardonnay, Sauvignon, Cabernet Sauvignon and more no doubt leaves you tipsy moments and endless gossiping hangouts.

stays.name: Sea Links Beach Hotel
stays.address: 9 Nguyen Thong, Mui Ne, Phan Thiet 800000 Vietnam
stays.about: Sea Links Beach Hotel is Vietnam’s first all-resort complex integrated in Sea Links City. Offering 188 elegant rooms and suites, four palatial-sized pools, restaurants and bars, spa, recreational amenities and the largest meeting facilities providing modern conveniences to every guest.Sea Links Beach Hotel is seated on the untouched bay of Mui Ne and a stone throw away from Phan Thiet City, Vietnam’s most southeastern province of Binh Thuan. The resort is approximately 198km drive from Tan Son Nhat International Airport and just minutes away from historic sites and the city’s splendours. Sea Links Beach Hotel offers the most breathtaking views of the surrounding area and is the ideal place to relax and unwind.

stays.name: Romana Resort & Spa
stays.address: Km 8, Mui Ne Ward, Phan Thiet Vietnam
stays.about: If you’re looking for a romantic resort in Phan Thiet, look no further than Romana Resort & Spa.Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the resort.Romana Hotel features a concierge and room service, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a pool and free breakfast. If you are driving to Romana Hotel, free parking is available.During your visit, be sure to check out a popular Phan Thiet crab restaurant such as Sunset Restaurant, which is a short distance from Romana Resort & Spa.Looking to explore? Then look no further than Thap Poshanu Cham Tower (1.1 mi), Po Sah Inu Towers (1.1 mi), and Forgotten Land Sand Sculpture Park (0.8 mi), which are some popular Phan Thiet attractions – all conveniently located within walking distance of the resort.The staff at Romana Resort & Spa looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

stays.name: Cham Villas
stays.address: 32 Nguyen Dinh Chieu, Phan Thiet Vietnam
stays.about: Cham Villas was created by a German-Vietnamese couple and opened in September 2004. Set in one hectare of lush tropical gardens, Cham Villas is a place to get away from the hustle and bustle, to chill out and be pampered. Tranquility, friendly service and privacy are the attributes of a perfect holiday. By integrating artefacts representing Vietnam's historic Cham era into the design of the garden and villas, the resort creates a unique atmosphere of total detachment and relaxation. Cham Villas is "Traveler's Choice Winner 2014" in the categories "Romance" and "Small Hotels" and was selected "Vietnam's Finest Hotel" in 2009 by Vietnam Travel.

stays.name: Diem Lien Guesthouse
stays.address: 85 Huynh Thuc Khang, Mui Ne, Phan Thiet Vietnam
stays.about: Finding an ideal charming guest house in Mui Ne does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Diem Lien Guesthouse, a nice option for travelers like you.Guest rooms offer amenities such as a refrigerator, a minibar, and air conditioning, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the guest house.Diem Lien Guesthouse features a 24 hour front desk, room service, and express check-in and check-out, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a lounge. If you are driving to Diem Lien Guesthouse, free parking is available.For those interested in checking out Linh Long Tu Temple (2.3 mi) while visiting Mui Ne, Diem Lien Guesthouse is a short distance away.While visiting Mui Ne, you may want to try some falafel at one of the nearby restaurants, such as El Cafe Vegetarian Food.If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Mui Ne Harbor (1.0 mi), which is a popular attraction amongst tourists, and it is within walking distance.Diem Lien Guesthouse puts the best of Mui Ne at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

stays.name: Pandanus Resort
stays.address: 3 Nguyen Huu Tho adjacent to the Red Sand Dunes, Mui Ne, Phan Thiet 801107 Vietnam
stays.about: Built in 2004 within a ten hectare lush tropical garden on a three hundred metre long beach, the Pandanus Resort in Mui Ne has a large range of facilities and a variety of different accommodations, all designed to make your stay relaxing and enjoyable. Adjacent to the long, sandy beach is a huge free-form pool, surrounding an island covered with coconut palm trees. The buildings are designed to complement, not compete with the natural surroundings. The beach is serene and disturbed only by an occasional fisherman in a round pitch basket, or a wind and kite surfer.

stays.name: MuiNe deCentury Beach Resort & Spa
stays.address: 16 Huynh Thuc Khang Str., Phan Thiet Vietnam
stays.about: MuiNe deCentury, a 4-star resort, is situated on the mid of the 4-hectare land, which features more than hundreds species of the over 50-year-old coconut trees and tropical fruits among a velvety grass-covered landscape, over 200 m off of the bright white Beach of Mui Ne along. It takes about 30 minutes drive from City Center and 4 hours from Airport in HCMC on long. The resort offers 60 building rooms and 34 luxurious Villa rooms in four different types, each offering distinctive experiences with their own beautiful views. Restaurant is open 24-hour a day, serving popular Asian and Western cuisine for lunch and fine seafood for dinner. The Resort offers lots of free space and entertainments like outdoor fitness, volleyball, tennis counts as well as a children playing ground and wedding planning.

stays.name: MAY Bungalow
stays.address: 246/2 Nguyen Dinh Chieu Ham Tien Beach, Mui Ne, Phan Thiet Vietnam
stays.about: Located in the East Ham Tien Beach neighborhood in Mui Ne, 16.1 km from Phan Thiet, MAY Bungalow features free WiFi access and free private parking. Each room is fitted with a flat-screen TV. Every room includes a private bathroom with a bidet and shower, with slippers and free toiletries provided. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. The nearest airport is Lien Khuong Airport

stays.name: Golden Coast Resort and Spa
stays.address: Tien An, Tien Thanh, Phan Thiet Vietnam
stays.about: Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Phan Thiet, Golden Coast Resort and Spa is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its romantic environment and proximity to great restaurants, Golden Coast Resort and Spa makes it easy to enjoy the best of Phan Thiet.Golden Coast Resort and Spa is a romantic hotel offering air conditioning and a minibar in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.The hotel features a concierge and room service. Plus, guests can enjoy a pool and an on-site restaurant, which have made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Phan Thiet. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.Travelers looking for a place to eat close to Golden Coast Resort and Spa can head to 1+1 Restaurant (0.0 mi) or Taverna Coffee & Restaurant (0.4 mi), all of which are within walking distance.Plus, during your trip, don't forget to check out a history museum, such as Ho Chi Minh Museum.Whether you’re traveling for business, pleasure or both, Golden Coast Resort and Spa is sure to make your visit to Phan Thiet one worth remembering.

stays.name: Little Mui Ne Cottages
stays.address: 10B Huynh Thuc Khang Street, Phan Thiet 62000 Vietnam
stays.about: Looking for a place to stay in Phan Thiet? Then look no further than Little Mui Ne Cottages, a family-friendly resort that brings the best of Phan Thiet to your doorstep.You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer air conditioning, a minibar, and a refrigerator, and you can stay connected during your stay as Little Mui Ne Cottages offers guests free wifi.The resort features a 24 hour front desk, room service, and a concierge. Plus, Little Mui Ne Cottages offers a pool and free breakfast, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.While you’re here, be sure to check out Mughal House Indian Halal Restaurant - Mui Ne, one of the Indian restaurants that can be found in Phan Thiet, which is a short distance from Little Mui Ne Cottages Hotel.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Little Mui Ne Cottages as you experience everything Phan Thiet has to offer.

stays.about: Opened in 2019, in a charming Vietnamese/Caribbean mixed-style of architecture, with all the modern comfort, MiNhon MuiNe Hotel is located in the middle of Ham Tien fishing village in a very peaceful and green alley. MiNhon MuiNe Hotel features 15 spacious rooms Guests can relax 1) around our pool 2) on our spacious sun rooftop terraces for more privacy. 3) at YoYo Beach Bar (3mn walk)

stays.address: 49 Huynh Thuc Khang, Mui Ne, Phan Thiet Vietnam
stays.about: Hoang Nga Guesthouse is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Mui Ne, offering a charming environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.Hoang Nga Guesthouse offers guests an array of room amenities including air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available.The guest house offers a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and express check-in and check-out, to make your visit even more pleasant. The property also features an on-site restaurant. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking.While staying at Hoang Nga Guesthouse, visitors can check out Mui Ne Harbor (1.6 mi) and Linh Long Tu Temple (2.8 mi), some of Mui Ne's top attractions.During your visit, be sure to check out one of Mui Ne's popular Mexican restaurants such as El Cafe Vegetarian Food, Hill's Burgeria Bar & Restaurant, and Lucy Liu, all a short distance from Hoang Nga Guesthouse.Enjoy your stay in Mui Ne!

Welcome to Canary Beach Resort, a nice option for travelers like you.Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at Canary Beach Resort offer air conditioning, a refrigerator, and a minibar.During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including a 24 hour front desk, room service, and baggage storage. Guests of Canary Beach Resort are also welcome to enjoy a pool and an on-site restaurant. For travelers arriving by car, free parking is available.While in Phan Thiet, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Canary Beach Resort, including Thinh Phat Mui Ne Restaurant (0.6 mi), Golden Sunlight Mui Ne (0.5 mi), and Quan Lau De (0.8 mi).Canary Beach Resort puts the best of Phan Thiet at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

Welcome to Little Paris Resort & Spa, a nice option for travelers like you.Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at Little Paris Resort & Spa offer a minibar and air conditioning.During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including a 24 hour front desk, room service, and a sun terrace. Guests of Little Paris Resort & Spa are also welcome to enjoy a pool and a lounge, located on site. For travelers arriving by car, free parking is available.While you’re here, be sure to check out some of the Chinese restaurants, including Bo Ke Hong Hao Restaurant and Razgulay, all of which are a short distance from Little Paris Resort & Spa.Little Paris Resort & Spa puts the best of Phan Thiet at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

stays.name: Bamboo Village Beach Resort & Spa
stays.address: 38 Nguyen Dinh Chieu, Ham Tien Ward, Phan Thiet Vietnam
stays.about: A popular destination for couples and honeymooners, the multi-award winning Bamboo Village Beach Resort & Spa has won the love and trust of travelers from around the world for the past 18 years as “Home of the Blissful Bamboo Villager.” Bamboo Village Beach Resort & Spa incorporates 147 authentic Vietnamese rooms and bungalows wallowing in green, tropical gardens filled with bamboo trees and tropical plants. The white sandy beaches lie in harmony with the blue ocean and stretch into the coconut palms where cabanas and two sunlit swimming pools lie beneath their shadow. This is the venue for the superb Strawy restaurant, acclaimed by diners who enjoy meals seasoned by oceanic and local flavors, from buffet breakfast delicacies to late evening snacks and dinners of delicious Vietnamese food accompanied by live musical entertainment. The Escape Bar offers splendid view of the lagoon and a calming place to enjoy a cocktail. The Water Lily Spa offers treatments from Switzerland, Bali and Vietnam using the best of beauty and healthcare products and the skilled and friendly masseuses are trained to professional international standards. Yoga classes are offered daily in the specialized yoga studio with a wooden floor and floor to ceiling glass overlooking the peaceful Zen garden. The special feature of this resort is the friendliness, helpfulness and good humor of the staff.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: The Cliff Resort & Residences
stays.address: Zone 5, Phu Hai Ward, Phan Thiet 800000 Vietnam
stays.about: Located in the prime location of Mui Ne, The Cliff Resort & Residences is a brand new 4-star plus resort complex offering a majestic oceanfront setting with breathtaking views and sophisticated services. Situated on a 3-hectare picturesque piece of land, The Cliff consists of: 128 rooms with 95% sea view (beachfront bungalows, panoramic sea view condos & penthouse, beachfront villas with private swimming pool) - meeting room for up to 200 people - Vista Restaurant managed by famous Hoang Yen Restaurant Group - luxurious Zest Spa - The Den Entertainment: mini-cinema, karaoke, billiards, ping-pong... - Recreational facilities include 2 outdoor swimming pools, fitness center and a variety of beach sports: jetski, kayak, kite surfing, wind surfing...Business category: 4-star plus Resort & Residences. Employees in Vietnam: 250

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Grace Boutique Resort
stays.address: 144A Nguyen Dinh Chieu, Phan Thiet Vietnam
stays.about: Located on the beautiful Mui Ne Bay, Grace Boutique Resort offers an idyllic serene getaway. Overlooking the sea and a flower-filled tropical garden, the Mediterranean inspired resort house comfortable rooms all with private balcony or patio, perfect for viewing the unforgettable South China Sea sunsets. The resort also features an elegant terrace restaurant and a delightful infinity pool.

stays.name: Sailing Club Resort Mui Ne
stays.address: 24 Nguyen Dinh Chieu Ham Tien, Phan Thiet Vietnam
stays.about: Sailing Club Resort Mui Ne is a small and exclusive boutique resort located on pristine beachfront in the heart of laid-back Mui Ne, in the Binh Thuan province. Sailing Club Resort Mui Ne is a luxe, sustainability-minded oasis of tranquillity and comfort; a true haven of tranquillity and relaxation for couples and families alike! Please note no pets allowed at this resort.

stays.name: Anantara Mui Ne Resort
stays.address: 12A Nguyen Dinh Chieu, Ham Tien, Phan Thiet Vietnam
stays.about: Set on Mui Ne’s pristinely sweeping beach, Anantara Mui Ne Resort & Spa is an oasis of elegance and comfort offering a unique and unforgettable way to experience the southern coast of Vietnam. Mornings spent by the sea. Afternoon hikes through nearby sand dunes. A soothing spa treatment before starlit evening drinks on the beach.Expertly blending Vietnamese tradition and legendary Anantara service, Anantara Mui Ne Resort & Spa offers a tropical retreat, worlds away from Vietnam’s urban bustle. Take in the splendour of the sunset from the pool deck. Sample fine international dining and mouth-watering cuisine at our restaurants, some of the best Mui Ne resorts have to offer. Wander down garden paths to your own private villa. A cherished holiday within a setting to remember forever in our exceptional Vietnam hotel.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Shades Resort
stays.address: 98A Nguyen Dien Chieu Mui Ne, Phan Thiet 620000 Vietnam
stays.about: Shades Resort offers a selection of 10 well appointed rooms, 1 outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi access. All rooms have Ocean or Pool Views. Complimentary breakfast is served daily overlooking the beautiful Mui Ne Bay Within a short walk from restaurants and bars, Shades is a 10 minute drive to the Red Sand Dunes, fishing Village, local Ham Tien market, and a 20-minute drive to Phan Thiet City. It is a 45-minute drive out to the White Sand Dunes and a 4 hour drive from Tan Son Nhat International Airport. After Our recent refurbishment we can offer King Beds, marble bathrooms with rain shower showers. At the reception, don't hesitate to ask for any assistance regarding motorbike hireage, kite surfing schools and our local cooking school. Laundry and luggage storage services are also available. On-site parking is free. Send us an email today so we can tailor your next break to Mui Ne especially for you. Check out our Tripadvisor Specials!!!

stays.name: Victoria Phan Thiet Beach Resort & Spa
stays.address: Km 9, Phu Hai,, Mui Ne, Phan Thiet Vietnam
stays.about: The Victoria Phan Thiet Beach Resort & Spa is everything that the other hotels in the area are not. It is secluded, peaceful, elegant and welcoming. It's a resort where the needs and wishes of the guest have been put first - Simple touches like free sunscreen at the pool, a top-notch kids club that caters for kids of all ages, and a "butler" service to take care of everything guests need. We use our Victoria heritage to offer a special experience at the seaside village - not just another few days in a lounge chair but a real feeling of being in Vietnam. We take care to share genuine local experiences, culture and cuisine with our guests. From a romantic white tablecloth picnic on the dunes to an early morning accompanied trip to the fish market along with our chef.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Mui Ne Hills Villa Hotel
stays.address: 69a Nguyen Dinh Chieu, Ham Tien, Phan Thiet Vietnam
stays.about: Mui Ne Hills Villa Hotel is very centrally located on Nguyen Dinh Chieu 69, just 300 meters uphill from the main road. We opened in October 2010 and completely finished a fabulous renovation end 2018. This is our boutique hotel withonly 19 very cozy rooms. Mui Ne Hills Villa Hotel has a beautiful swimming pool, 2 sun decks with plenty of lounge chairs to chill out and a bar. All rooms have A/C, cable T/V, minibar, hairdryer, safe and free WIFI. Fantastic views over the bay of Mui Ne are guaranteed from either the swimming pool and some of the rooms. The warm-hearted Mui Ne Hills hospitality combined with the stunning views and peaceful surroundings will ensure an absorbing experience conducive to rest and relaxation. A short 10 minutes walk will take you to the BEST part of the white sandy beach of Mui Ne. Breakfast, lunch and dinner is served at 100 meter distance in our famous BREEZE Restaurant & Bar whilst a fresh ocean breeze relaxes the mind continuously. The exclusive settin

stays.name: Full Moon Village
stays.address: Suoi Nuoc Beach, Mui Ne, Phan Thiet 84062 Vietnam
stays.about: The Full Moon Village is a hidden retreat located away from touristic bustle on a long strip of untouched sandy beach only 20 km away from Mui Ne. Inspired by traditional Northern Vietnamese countryside houses 17 spacious (minimum 140 sq.m.) villas have modern amenities and fully-equipped kitchen. The décor of villas includes distinctive handicrafts and rare fabrics carefully collected from different corners of Vietnam.

stays.name: An Can - Delight Hotel
stays.address: 109B Nguyen Dinh Chieu, Phan Thiet Vietnam
stays.about: An Can - Delight Hotel is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Phan Thiet, offering a family-friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.Close to Forgotten Land Sand Sculpture Park (2.5 mi), a popular Phan Thiet landmark, An Can - Delight Hotel is a great destination for tourists.An Can - Delight Hotel offers guests an array of room amenities including air conditioning and a refrigerator, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available.The small hotel offers a concierge, to make your visit even more pleasant. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking.During your visit, be sure to check out one of Phan Thiet's popular ribs restaurants such as Joe's Cafe and Hill's Smokeria restaurant and bar, all a short distance from An Can - Delight Hotel.During your visit, be sure to check out a popular  like Van Thuy Tu Communal House, which is a short distance from the small hotel.Enjoy your stay in Phan Thiet!

stays.name: Mui Ne Hills Bliss Hotel
stays.address: 69b Nguyen Dinh Chieu, Ham Tien, Phan Thiet Vietnam
stays.about: Mui Ne Hills Bliss Hotel opened early 2015 and completely renovated in 2020 is very centrally located in Mui Ne just 300 meters from the BEST part of the beach, up a small hill, overlooking the whole bay of Mui Ne, It is designed for the luxury traveller longing for a perfect place to unwind completely. We also house the famous BREEZE Restaurant & Bar for your perfect wining and dining experience

stays.name: Xin Chao Hotel
stays.address: Nguyen Dinh Chieu 129, Phan Thiet 62000 Vietnam
stays.about: Xin Chao Hotel is a small family run hotel with restaurant/bar facilities and very friendly staff. 20 beautiful appointed rooms with ensuite bathroom, air-conditioning, flat screen tv and very clean. We have a choice of Villa or Pool rooms, standard ,deluxe, twin or triple. In the courtyard garden there is a beautiful clean swimming pool to relax and we offer free high speed wifi for guests. The reception area is perfect to lounge, read a book, watch tv, play pool or just simply have a chat with other guests. Prices at Xin Chao Hotel are seasonal. We hope to welcome you soon!
